75 {
76  LOCK(cs_wallet);
77  std::map<uint256, CWalletTx>::const_iterator it = mapWallet.find(hash);

83 CPubKey CWallet::GenerateNewKey()
84 {
85  AssertLockHeld(cs_wallet); // mapKeyMetadata
86  bool fCompressed = CanSupportFeature(FEATURE_COMPRPUBKEY); // default to compressed public keys if we want 0.6.0 wallets
87 
88  RandAddSeedPerfmon();
89  CKey secret;
90  secret.MakeNewKey(fCompressed);
91 
92  // Compressed public keys were introduced in version 0.6.0
93  if (fCompressed)
94  SetMinVersion(FEATURE_COMPRPUBKEY);
95 
96  CPubKey pubkey = secret.GetPubKey();
97  assert(secret.VerifyPubKey(pubkey));
98 
99  // Create new metadata
100  int64_t nCreationTime = GetTime();
101  mapKeyMetadata[pubkey.GetID()] = CKeyMetadata(nCreationTime);
102  if (!nTimeFirstKey || nCreationTime < nTimeFirstKey)
103  nTimeFirstKey = nCreationTime;
104 
105  if (!AddKeyPubKey(secret, pubkey))
106  throw std::runtime_error("CWallet::GenerateNewKey() : AddKey failed");
107  return pubkey;
108 }

110 bool CWallet::AddKeyPubKey(const CKey& secret, const CPubKey& pubkey)
111 {
112  AssertLockHeld(cs_wallet); // mapKeyMetadata
113  if (!CCryptoKeyStore::AddKeyPubKey(secret, pubkey))
114  return false;
115 
116  // check if we need to remove from watch-only
117  CScript script;
118  script = GetScriptForDestination(pubkey.GetID());
119  if (HaveWatchOnly(script))
120  RemoveWatchOnly(script);
121 
122  if (!fFileBacked)
123  return true;
124  if (!IsCrypted()) {
125  return CWalletDB(strWalletFile).WriteKey(pubkey, secret.GetPrivKey(), mapKeyMetadata[pubkey.GetID()]);
126  }
127  return true;
128 }

130 bool CWallet::AddCryptedKey(const CPubKey& vchPubKey,
131  const vector<unsigned char>& vchCryptedSecret)
132 {
133  if (!CCryptoKeyStore::AddCryptedKey(vchPubKey, vchCryptedSecret))
134  return false;
135  if (!fFileBacked)
136  return true;
137  {
138  LOCK(cs_wallet);
139  if (pwalletdbEncryption)
140  return pwalletdbEncryption->WriteCryptedKey(vchPubKey,
141  vchCryptedSecret,
142  mapKeyMetadata[vchPubKey.GetID()]);
143  else
144  return CWalletDB(strWalletFile).WriteCryptedKey(vchPubKey, vchCryptedSecret, mapKeyMetadata[vchPubKey.GetID()]);
145  }
146  return false;
147 }

173 bool CWallet::LoadCScript(const CScript& redeemScript)
174 {
175  /* A sanity check was added in pull #3843 to avoid adding redeemScripts
176  * that never can be redeemed. However, old wallets may still contain
177  * these. Do not add them to the wallet and warn. */
178  if (redeemScript.size() > MAX_SCRIPT_ELEMENT_SIZE) {
179  std::string strAddr = CBitcoinAddress(CScriptID(redeemScript)).ToString();
180  LogPrintf("%s: Warning: This wallet contains a redeemScript of size %i which exceeds maximum size %i thus can never be redeemed. Do not use address %s.\n",
181  __func__, redeemScript.size(), MAX_SCRIPT_ELEMENT_SIZE, strAddr);
182  return true;
183  }
184 
185  return CCryptoKeyStore::AddCScript(redeemScript);
186 }

189 {

195  return true;
196  return CWalletDB(strWalletFile).WriteWatchOnly(dest);

248 bool CWallet::Unlock(const SecureString& strWalletPassphrase, bool anonymizeOnly)
249 {
250  SecureString strWalletPassphraseFinal;
251 
252  if (!IsLocked()) {
253  fWalletUnlockAnonymizeOnly = anonymizeOnly;
254  return true;
255  }
256 
257  strWalletPassphraseFinal = strWalletPassphrase;
258 
259 
260  CCrypter crypter;
261  CKeyingMaterial vMasterKey;
262 
263  {
264  LOCK(cs_wallet);
265  BOOST_FOREACH (const MasterKeyMap::value_type& pMasterKey, mapMasterKeys) {
266  if (!crypter.SetKeyFromPassphrase(strWalletPassphraseFinal, pMasterKey.second.vchSalt, pMasterKey.second.nDeriveIterations, pMasterKey.second.nDerivationMethod))
267  return false;
268  if (!crypter.Decrypt(pMasterKey.second.vchCryptedKey, vMasterKey))
269  continue; // try another master key
270  if (CCryptoKeyStore::Unlock(vMasterKey)) {
271  fWalletUnlockAnonymizeOnly = anonymizeOnly;
272  return true;
273  }
274  }
275  }
276  return false;
277 }
278 
279 bool CWallet::ChangeWalletPassphrase(const SecureString& strOldWalletPassphrase, const SecureString& strNewWalletPassphrase)
280 {
281  bool fWasLocked = IsLocked();
282  SecureString strOldWalletPassphraseFinal = strOldWalletPassphrase;
283 
284  {
285  LOCK(cs_wallet);
286  Lock();
287 
288  CCrypter crypter;
289  CKeyingMaterial vMasterKey;
290  BOOST_FOREACH (MasterKeyMap::value_type& pMasterKey, mapMasterKeys) {
291  if (!crypter.SetKeyFromPassphrase(strOldWalletPassphraseFinal, pMasterKey.second.vchSalt, pMasterKey.second.nDeriveIterations, pMasterKey.second.nDerivationMethod))
292  return false;
293  if (!crypter.Decrypt(pMasterKey.second.vchCryptedKey, vMasterKey))
294  return false;
295  if (CCryptoKeyStore::Unlock(vMasterKey)) {
296  int64_t nStartTime = GetTimeMillis();
297  crypter.SetKeyFromPassphrase(strNewWalletPassphrase, pMasterKey.second.vchSalt, pMasterKey.second.nDeriveIterations, pMasterKey.second.nDerivationMethod);
298  pMasterKey.second.nDeriveIterations = pMasterKey.second.nDeriveIterations * (100 / ((double)(GetTimeMillis() - nStartTime)));
299 
300  nStartTime = GetTimeMillis();
301  crypter.SetKeyFromPassphrase(strNewWalletPassphrase, pMasterKey.second.vchSalt, pMasterKey.second.nDeriveIterations, pMasterKey.second.nDerivationMethod);
302  pMasterKey.second.nDeriveIterations = (pMasterKey.second.nDeriveIterations + pMasterKey.second.nDeriveIterations * 100 / ((double)(GetTimeMillis() - nStartTime))) / 2;
303 
304  if (pMasterKey.second.nDeriveIterations < 25000)
305  pMasterKey.second.nDeriveIterations = 25000;
306 
307  LogPrintf("Wallet passphrase changed to an nDeriveIterations of %i\n", pMasterKey.second.nDeriveIterations);
308 
309  if (!crypter.SetKeyFromPassphrase(strNewWalletPassphrase, pMasterKey.second.vchSalt, pMasterKey.second.nDeriveIterations, pMasterKey.second.nDerivationMethod))
310  return false;
311  if (!crypter.Encrypt(vMasterKey, pMasterKey.second.vchCryptedKey))
312  return false;
313  CWalletDB(strWalletFile).WriteMasterKey(pMasterKey.first, pMasterKey.second);
314  if (fWasLocked)
315  Lock();
316 
317  return true;
318  }
319  }
320  }
321 
322  return false;
323 }

331 bool CWallet::SetMinVersion(enum WalletFeature nVersion, CWalletDB* pwalletdbIn, bool fExplicit)
332 {
333  LOCK(cs_wallet); // nWalletVersion
334  if (nWalletVersion >= nVersion)
335  return true;
336 
337  // when doing an explicit upgrade, if we pass the max version permitted, upgrade all the way
338  if (fExplicit && nVersion > nWalletMaxVersion)
339  nVersion = FEATURE_LATEST;
340 
341  nWalletVersion = nVersion;
342 
343  if (nVersion > nWalletMaxVersion)
344  nWalletMaxVersion = nVersion;
345 
346  if (fFileBacked) {
347  CWalletDB* pwalletdb = pwalletdbIn ? pwalletdbIn : new CWalletDB(strWalletFile);
348  if (nWalletVersion > 40000)
349  pwalletdb->WriteMinVersion(nWalletVersion);
350  if (!pwalletdbIn)
351  delete pwalletdb;
352  }
353 
354  return true;
355 }

357 bool CWallet::SetMaxVersion(int nVersion)
358 {
359  LOCK(cs_wallet); // nWalletVersion, nWalletMaxVersion
360  // cannot downgrade below current version
361  if (nWalletVersion > nVersion)
362  return false;
363 
364  nWalletMaxVersion = nVersion;
365 
366  return true;
367 }

369 set<uint256> CWallet::GetConflicts(const uint256& txid) const
370 {
371  set<uint256> result;
372  AssertLockHeld(cs_wallet);
373 
374  std::map<uint256, CWalletTx>::const_iterator it = mapWallet.find(txid);
375  if (it == mapWallet.end())
376  return result;
377  const CWalletTx& wtx = it->second;
378 
379  std::pair<TxSpends::const_iterator, TxSpends::const_iterator> range;
380 
381  BOOST_FOREACH (const CTxIn& txin, wtx.vin) {
382  if (mapTxSpends.count(txin.prevout) <= 1 || wtx.IsZerocoinSpend())
383  continue; // No conflict if zero or one spends
384  range = mapTxSpends.equal_range(txin.prevout);
385  for (TxSpends::const_iterator it = range.first; it != range.second; ++it)
386  result.insert(it->second);
387  }
388  return result;
389 }
390 
391 void CWallet::SyncMetaData(pair<TxSpends::iterator, TxSpends::iterator> range)
392 {
393  // We want all the wallet transactions in range to have the same metadata as
394  // the oldest (smallest nOrderPos).
395  // So: find smallest nOrderPos:
396 
397  int nMinOrderPos = std::numeric_limits<int>::max();
398  const CWalletTx* copyFrom = NULL;
399  for (TxSpends::iterator it = range.first; it != range.second; ++it) {
400  const uint256& hash = it->second;
401  int n = mapWallet[hash].nOrderPos;
402  if (n < nMinOrderPos) {
403  nMinOrderPos = n;
404  copyFrom = &mapWallet[hash];
405  }
406  }
407  // Now copy data from copyFrom to rest:
408  for (TxSpends::iterator it = range.first; it != range.second; ++it) {
409  const uint256& hash = it->second;
410  CWalletTx* copyTo = &mapWallet[hash];
411  if (copyFrom == copyTo) continue;
412  copyTo->mapValue = copyFrom->mapValue;
413  copyTo->vOrderForm = copyFrom->vOrderForm;
414  // fTimeReceivedIsTxTime not copied on purpose
415  // nTimeReceived not copied on purpose
416  copyTo->nTimeSmart = copyFrom->nTimeSmart;
417  copyTo->fFromMe = copyFrom->fFromMe;
418  copyTo->strFromAccount = copyFrom->strFromAccount;
419  // nOrderPos not copied on purpose
420  // cached members not copied on purpose
421  }
422 }

428 bool CWallet::IsSpent(const uint256& hash, unsigned int n) const
429 {
430  const COutPoint outpoint(hash, n);
431  pair<TxSpends::const_iterator, TxSpends::const_iterator> range;
432  range = mapTxSpends.equal_range(outpoint);
433  for (TxSpends::const_iterator it = range.first; it != range.second; ++it) {
434  const uint256& wtxid = it->second;
435  std::map<uint256, CWalletTx>::const_iterator mit = mapWallet.find(wtxid);
436  if (mit != mapWallet.end() && mit->second.GetDepthInMainChain() >= 0)
437  return true; // Spent
438  }
439  return false;
440 }

442 void CWallet::AddToSpends(const COutPoint& outpoint, const uint256& wtxid)
443 {
444  mapTxSpends.insert(make_pair(outpoint, wtxid));
445  pair<TxSpends::iterator, TxSpends::iterator> range;
446  range = mapTxSpends.equal_range(outpoint);
447  SyncMetaData(range);

451 void CWallet::AddToSpends(const uint256& wtxid)
452 {
453  assert(mapWallet.count(wtxid));
454  CWalletTx& thisTx = mapWallet[wtxid];
455  if (thisTx.IsCoinBase()) // Coinbases don't spend anything!
456  return;
457 
458  BOOST_FOREACH (const CTxIn& txin, thisTx.vin)
459  AddToSpends(txin.prevout, wtxid);
460 }

462 bool CWallet::GetMasternodeVinAndKeys(CTxIn& txinRet, CPubKey& pubKeyRet, CKey& keyRet, std::string strTxHash, std::string strOutputIndex)
463 {
464  // wait for reindex and/or import to finish
465  if (fImporting || fReindex) return false;
466 
467  // Find possible candidates
468  std::vector<COutput> vPossibleCoins;
469  AvailableCoins(vPossibleCoins, true, NULL, false, ONLY_10000);
470  if (vPossibleCoins.empty()) {
471  LogPrintf("CWallet::GetMasternodeVinAndKeys -- Could not locate any valid masternode vin\n");
472  return false;
473  }
474 
475  if (strTxHash.empty()) // No output specified, select the first one
476  return GetVinAndKeysFromOutput(vPossibleCoins[0], txinRet, pubKeyRet, keyRet);
477 
478  // Find specific vin
479  uint256 txHash = uint256S(strTxHash);
480 
481  int nOutputIndex;
482  try {
483  nOutputIndex = std::stoi(strOutputIndex.c_str());
484  } catch (const std::exception& e) {
485  LogPrintf("%s: %s on strOutputIndex\n", __func__, e.what());
486  return false;
487  }
488 
489  BOOST_FOREACH (COutput& out, vPossibleCoins)
490  if (out.tx->GetHash() == txHash && out.i == nOutputIndex) // found it!
491  return GetVinAndKeysFromOutput(out, txinRet, pubKeyRet, keyRet);
492 
493  LogPrintf("CWallet::GetMasternodeVinAndKeys -- Could not locate specified masternode vin\n");
494  return false;
495 }
496 
497 bool CWallet::GetVinAndKeysFromOutput(COutput out, CTxIn& txinRet, CPubKey& pubKeyRet, CKey& keyRet)
498 {
499  // wait for reindex and/or import to finish
500  if (fImporting || fReindex) return false;
501 
502  CScript pubScript;
503 
504  txinRet = CTxIn(out.tx->GetHash(), out.i);
505  pubScript = out.tx->vout[out.i].scriptPubKey; // the inputs PubKey
506 
507  CTxDestination address1;
508  ExtractDestination(pubScript, address1);
509  CBitcoinAddress address2(address1);
510 
511  CKeyID keyID;
512  if (!address2.GetKeyID(keyID)) {
513  LogPrintf("CWallet::GetVinAndKeysFromOutput -- Address does not refer to a key\n");
514  return false;
515  }
516 
517  if (!GetKey(keyID, keyRet)) {
518  LogPrintf("CWallet::GetVinAndKeysFromOutput -- Private key for address is not known\n");
519  return false;
520  }
521 
522  pubKeyRet = keyRet.GetPubKey();
523  return true;
524 }
525 
526 bool CWallet::EncryptWallet(const SecureString& strWalletPassphrase)
527 {
528  if (IsCrypted())
529  return false;
530 
531  CKeyingMaterial vMasterKey;
532  RandAddSeedPerfmon();
533 
534  vMasterKey.resize(WALLET_CRYPTO_KEY_SIZE);
535  GetRandBytes(&vMasterKey[0], WALLET_CRYPTO_KEY_SIZE);
536 
537  CMasterKey kMasterKey;
538  RandAddSeedPerfmon();
539 
540  kMasterKey.vchSalt.resize(WALLET_CRYPTO_SALT_SIZE);
541  GetRandBytes(&kMasterKey.vchSalt[0], WALLET_CRYPTO_SALT_SIZE);
542 
543  CCrypter crypter;
544  int64_t nStartTime = GetTimeMillis();
545  crypter.SetKeyFromPassphrase(strWalletPassphrase, kMasterKey.vchSalt, 25000, kMasterKey.nDerivationMethod);
546  kMasterKey.nDeriveIterations = 2500000 / ((double)(GetTimeMillis() - nStartTime));
547 
548  nStartTime = GetTimeMillis();
549  crypter.SetKeyFromPassphrase(strWalletPassphrase, kMasterKey.vchSalt, kMasterKey.nDeriveIterations, kMasterKey.nDerivationMethod);
550  kMasterKey.nDeriveIterations = (kMasterKey.nDeriveIterations + kMasterKey.nDeriveIterations * 100 / ((double)(GetTimeMillis() - nStartTime))) / 2;
551 
552  if (kMasterKey.nDeriveIterations < 25000)
553  kMasterKey.nDeriveIterations = 25000;
554 
555  LogPrintf("Encrypting Wallet with an nDeriveIterations of %i\n", kMasterKey.nDeriveIterations);
556 
557  if (!crypter.SetKeyFromPassphrase(strWalletPassphrase, kMasterKey.vchSalt, kMasterKey.nDeriveIterations, kMasterKey.nDerivationMethod))
558  return false;
559  if (!crypter.Encrypt(vMasterKey, kMasterKey.vchCryptedKey))
560  return false;
561 
562  {
563  LOCK(cs_wallet);
564  mapMasterKeys[++nMasterKeyMaxID] = kMasterKey;
565  if (fFileBacked) {
566  assert(!pwalletdbEncryption);
567  pwalletdbEncryption = new CWalletDB(strWalletFile);
568  if (!pwalletdbEncryption->TxnBegin()) {
569  delete pwalletdbEncryption;
570  pwalletdbEncryption = NULL;
571  return false;
572  }
573  pwalletdbEncryption->WriteMasterKey(nMasterKeyMaxID, kMasterKey);
574  }
575 
576  if (!EncryptKeys(vMasterKey)) {
577  if (fFileBacked) {
578  pwalletdbEncryption->TxnAbort();
579  delete pwalletdbEncryption;
580  }
581  // We now probably have half of our keys encrypted in memory, and half not...
582  // die and let the user reload their unencrypted wallet.
583  assert(false);
584  }
585 
586  // Encryption was introduced in version 0.4.0
587  SetMinVersion(FEATURE_WALLETCRYPT, pwalletdbEncryption, true);
588 
589  if (fFileBacked) {
590  if (!pwalletdbEncryption->TxnCommit()) {
591  delete pwalletdbEncryption;
592  // We now have keys encrypted in memory, but not on disk...
593  // die to avoid confusion and let the user reload their unencrypted wallet.
594  assert(false);
595  }
596 
597  delete pwalletdbEncryption;
598  pwalletdbEncryption = NULL;
599  }
600 
601  Lock();
602  Unlock(strWalletPassphrase);
603  NewKeyPool();
604  Lock();
605 
606  // Need to completely rewrite the wallet file; if we don't, bdb might keep
607  // bits of the unencrypted private key in slack space in the database file.
608  CDB::Rewrite(strWalletFile);
609  }
610  NotifyStatusChanged(this);
611 
612  return true;
613 }
614 
615 int64_t CWallet::IncOrderPosNext(CWalletDB* pwalletdb)
616 {
617  AssertLockHeld(cs_wallet); // nOrderPosNext
618  int64_t nRet = nOrderPosNext++;
619  if (pwalletdb) {
620  pwalletdb->WriteOrderPosNext(nOrderPosNext);
621  } else {
622  CWalletDB(strWalletFile).WriteOrderPosNext(nOrderPosNext);
623  }
624  return nRet;
625 }

627 CWallet::TxItems CWallet::OrderedTxItems(std::list<CAccountingEntry>& acentries, std::string strAccount)
628 {
629  AssertLockHeld(cs_wallet); // mapWallet
630  CWalletDB walletdb(strWalletFile);
631 
632  // First: get all CWalletTx and CAccountingEntry into a sorted-by-order multimap.
633  TxItems txOrdered;
634 
635  // Note: maintaining indices in the database of (account,time) --> txid and (account, time) --> acentry
636  // would make this much faster for applications that do this a lot.
637  for (map<uint256, CWalletTx>::iterator it = mapWallet.begin(); it != mapWallet.end(); ++it) {
638  CWalletTx* wtx = &((*it).second);
639  txOrdered.insert(make_pair(wtx->nOrderPos, TxPair(wtx, (CAccountingEntry*)0)));
640  }
641  acentries.clear();
642  walletdb.ListAccountCreditDebit(strAccount, acentries);
643  BOOST_FOREACH (CAccountingEntry& entry, acentries) {
644  txOrdered.insert(make_pair(entry.nOrderPos, TxPair((CWalletTx*)0, &entry)));
645  }
646 
647  return txOrdered;
648 }
649 
650 void CWallet::MarkDirty()
651 {
652  {
653  LOCK(cs_wallet);
654  BOOST_FOREACH (PAIRTYPE(const uint256, CWalletTx) & item, mapWallet)
655  item.second.MarkDirty();
656  }
657 }
658 
659 bool CWallet::AddToWallet(const CWalletTx& wtxIn, bool fFromLoadWallet)
660 {
661  uint256 hash = wtxIn.GetHash();
662 
663  if (fFromLoadWallet) {
664  mapWallet[hash] = wtxIn;
665  mapWallet[hash].BindWallet(this);
666  AddToSpends(hash);
667  } else {
668  LOCK(cs_wallet);
669  // Inserts only if not already there, returns tx inserted or tx found
670  pair<map<uint256, CWalletTx>::iterator, bool> ret = mapWallet.insert(make_pair(hash, wtxIn));
671  CWalletTx& wtx = (*ret.first).second;
672  wtx.BindWallet(this);
673  bool fInsertedNew = ret.second;
674  if (fInsertedNew) {
675  wtx.nTimeReceived = GetAdjustedTime();
676  wtx.nOrderPos = IncOrderPosNext();
677 
678  wtx.nTimeSmart = wtx.nTimeReceived;
679  if (wtxIn.hashBlock != 0) {
680  if (mapBlockIndex.count(wtxIn.hashBlock)) {
681  int64_t latestNow = wtx.nTimeReceived;
682  int64_t latestEntry = 0;
683  {
684  // Tolerate times up to the last timestamp in the wallet not more than 5 minutes into the future
685  int64_t latestTolerated = latestNow + 300;
686  std::list<CAccountingEntry> acentries;
687  TxItems txOrdered = OrderedTxItems(acentries);
688  for (TxItems::reverse_iterator it = txOrdered.rbegin(); it != txOrdered.rend(); ++it) {
689  CWalletTx* const pwtx = (*it).second.first;
690  if (pwtx == &wtx)
691  continue;
692  CAccountingEntry* const pacentry = (*it).second.second;
693  int64_t nSmartTime;
694  if (pwtx) {
695  nSmartTime = pwtx->nTimeSmart;
696  if (!nSmartTime)
697  nSmartTime = pwtx->nTimeReceived;
698  } else
699  nSmartTime = pacentry->nTime;
700  if (nSmartTime <= latestTolerated) {
701  latestEntry = nSmartTime;
702  if (nSmartTime > latestNow)
703  latestNow = nSmartTime;
704  break;
705  }
706  }
707  }
708 
709  int64_t blocktime = mapBlockIndex[wtxIn.hashBlock]->GetBlockTime();
710  wtx.nTimeSmart = std::max(latestEntry, std::min(blocktime, latestNow));
711  } else
712  LogPrintf("AddToWallet() : found %s in block %s not in index\n",
713  wtxIn.GetHash().ToString(),
714  wtxIn.hashBlock.ToString());
715  }
716  AddToSpends(hash);
717  }
718 
719  bool fUpdated = false;
720  if (!fInsertedNew) {
721  // Merge
722  if (wtxIn.hashBlock != 0 && wtxIn.hashBlock != wtx.hashBlock) {
723  wtx.hashBlock = wtxIn.hashBlock;
724  fUpdated = true;
725  }
726  if (wtxIn.nIndex != -1 && (wtxIn.vMerkleBranch != wtx.vMerkleBranch || wtxIn.nIndex != wtx.nIndex)) {
727  wtx.vMerkleBranch = wtxIn.vMerkleBranch;
728  wtx.nIndex = wtxIn.nIndex;
729  fUpdated = true;
730  }
731  if (wtxIn.fFromMe && wtxIn.fFromMe != wtx.fFromMe) {
732  wtx.fFromMe = wtxIn.fFromMe;
733  fUpdated = true;
734  }
735  }
736 
738  LogPrintf("AddToWallet %s %s%s\n", wtxIn.GetHash().ToString(), (fInsertedNew ? "new" : ""), (fUpdated ? "update" : ""));
739 
740  // Write to disk
741  if (fInsertedNew || fUpdated)
742  if (!wtx.WriteToDisk())
743  return false;
744 
745  // Break debit/credit balance caches:
746  wtx.MarkDirty();
747 
748  // Notify UI of new or updated transaction
749  NotifyTransactionChanged(this, hash, fInsertedNew ? CT_NEW : CT_UPDATED);
750 
751  // notify an external script when a wallet transaction comes in or is updated
752  std::string strCmd = GetArg("-walletnotify", "");
753 
754  if (!strCmd.empty()) {
755  boost::replace_all(strCmd, "%s", wtxIn.GetHash().GetHex());
756  boost::thread t(runCommand, strCmd); // thread runs free
757  }
758  }
759  return true;
760 }
761 
767 bool CWallet::AddToWalletIfInvolvingMe(const CTransaction& tx, const CBlock* pblock, bool fUpdate)
768 {
769  {
770  AssertLockHeld(cs_wallet);
771  bool fExisted = mapWallet.count(tx.GetHash()) != 0;
772  if (fExisted && !fUpdate) return false;
773  if (fExisted || IsMine(tx) || IsFromMe(tx)) {
774  CWalletTx wtx(this, tx);
775  // Get merkle branch if transaction was found in a block
776  if (pblock)
777  wtx.SetMerkleBranch(*pblock);
778  return AddToWallet(wtx);
779  }
780  }
781  return false;
782 }
783 
784 void CWallet::SyncTransaction(const CTransaction& tx, const CBlock* pblock)
785 {
786  LOCK2(cs_main, cs_wallet);
787  if (!AddToWalletIfInvolvingMe(tx, pblock, true))
788  return; // Not one of ours
789 
790  // If a transaction changes 'conflicted' state, that changes the balance
791  // available of the outputs it spends. So force those to be
792  // recomputed, also:
793  BOOST_FOREACH (const CTxIn& txin, tx.vin) {
794  if (!tx.IsZerocoinSpend() && mapWallet.count(txin.prevout.hash))
795  mapWallet[txin.prevout.hash].MarkDirty();
796  }
797 }

802  return;
803  {
804  LOCK(cs_wallet);
805  if (mapWallet.erase(hash))
806  CWalletDB(strWalletFile).EraseTx(hash);
807  }
808  return;
809 }

813 {

817  if (mi != mapWallet.end()) {
818  const CWalletTx& prev = (*mi).second;
819  if (txin.prevout.n < prev.vout.size())
820  return IsMine(prev.vout[txin.prevout.n]);
821  }
822  }
823  return ISMINE_NO;

831 CAmount CWallet::GetDebit(const CTxIn& txin, const isminefilter& filter) const
832 {
833  {
834  LOCK(cs_wallet);
835  map<uint256, CWalletTx>::const_iterator mi = mapWallet.find(txin.prevout.hash);
836  if (mi != mapWallet.end()) {
837  const CWalletTx& prev = (*mi).second;
838  if (txin.prevout.n < prev.vout.size())
839  if (IsMine(prev.vout[txin.prevout.n]) & filter)
840  return prev.vout[txin.prevout.n].nValue;
841  }
842  }
843  return 0;
844 }

846 // Recursively determine the rounds of a given input (How deep is the Obfuscation chain for a given input)
847 int CWallet::GetRealInputObfuscationRounds(CTxIn in, int rounds) const
848 {
849  static std::map<uint256, CMutableTransaction> mDenomWtxes;
850 
851  if (rounds >= 16) return 15; // 16 rounds max
852 
853  uint256 hash = in.prevout.hash;
854  unsigned int nout = in.prevout.n;
855 
856  const CWalletTx* wtx = GetWalletTx(hash);
857  if (wtx != NULL) {
858  std::map<uint256, CMutableTransaction>::const_iterator mdwi = mDenomWtxes.find(hash);
859  // not known yet, let's add it
860  if (mdwi == mDenomWtxes.end()) {
861  LogPrint("obfuscation", "GetInputObfuscationRounds INSERTING %s\n", hash.ToString());
862  mDenomWtxes[hash] = CMutableTransaction(*wtx);
863  }
864  // found and it's not an initial value, just return it
865  else if (mDenomWtxes[hash].vout[nout].nRounds != -10) {
866  return mDenomWtxes[hash].vout[nout].nRounds;
867  }
868 
869 
870  // bounds check
871  if (nout >= wtx->vout.size()) {
872  // should never actually hit this
873  LogPrint("obfuscation", "GetInputObfuscationRounds UPDATED %s %3d %3d\n", hash.ToString(), nout, -4);
874  return -4;
875  }
876 
877  if (pwalletMain->IsCollateralAmount(wtx->vout[nout].nValue)) {
878  mDenomWtxes[hash].vout[nout].nRounds = -3;
879  LogPrint("obfuscation", "GetInputObfuscationRounds UPDATED %s %3d %3d\n", hash.ToString(), nout, mDenomWtxes[hash].vout[nout].nRounds);
880  return mDenomWtxes[hash].vout[nout].nRounds;
881  }
882 
883  //make sure the final output is non-denominate
884  if (/*rounds == 0 && */ !IsDenominatedAmount(wtx->vout[nout].nValue)) //NOT DENOM
885  {
886  mDenomWtxes[hash].vout[nout].nRounds = -2;
887  LogPrint("obfuscation", "GetInputObfuscationRounds UPDATED %s %3d %3d\n", hash.ToString(), nout, mDenomWtxes[hash].vout[nout].nRounds);
888  return mDenomWtxes[hash].vout[nout].nRounds;
889  }
890 
891  bool fAllDenoms = true;
892  BOOST_FOREACH (CTxOut out, wtx->vout) {
893  fAllDenoms = fAllDenoms && IsDenominatedAmount(out.nValue);
894  }
895  // this one is denominated but there is another non-denominated output found in the same tx
896  if (!fAllDenoms) {
897  mDenomWtxes[hash].vout[nout].nRounds = 0;
898  LogPrint("obfuscation", "GetInputObfuscationRounds UPDATED %s %3d %3d\n", hash.ToString(), nout, mDenomWtxes[hash].vout[nout].nRounds);
899  return mDenomWtxes[hash].vout[nout].nRounds;
900  }
901 
902  int nShortest = -10; // an initial value, should be no way to get this by calculations
903  bool fDenomFound = false;
904  // only denoms here so let's look up
905  BOOST_FOREACH (CTxIn in2, wtx->vin) {
906  if (IsMine(in2)) {
907  int n = GetRealInputObfuscationRounds(in2, rounds + 1);
908  // denom found, find the shortest chain or initially assign nShortest with the first found value
909  if (n >= 0 && (n < nShortest || nShortest == -10)) {
910  nShortest = n;
911  fDenomFound = true;
912  }
913  }
914  }
915  mDenomWtxes[hash].vout[nout].nRounds = fDenomFound ? (nShortest >= 15 ? 16 : nShortest + 1) // good, we a +1 to the shortest one but only 16 rounds max allowed
916  :
917  0; // too bad, we are the fist one in that chain
918  LogPrint("obfuscation", "GetInputObfuscationRounds UPDATED %s %3d %3d\n", hash.ToString(), nout, mDenomWtxes[hash].vout[nout].nRounds);
919  return mDenomWtxes[hash].vout[nout].nRounds;
920  }
921 
922  return rounds - 1;
923 }
924 
925 // respect current settings
926 int CWallet::GetInputObfuscationRounds(CTxIn in) const
927 {
928  LOCK(cs_wallet);
929  int realObfuscationRounds = GetRealInputObfuscationRounds(in, 0);
930  return realObfuscationRounds > nZeromintPercentage ? nZeromintPercentage : realObfuscationRounds;
931 }

933 bool CWallet::IsDenominated(const CTxIn& txin) const

938  if (mi != mapWallet.end()) {
939  const CWalletTx& prev = (*mi).second;
940  if (txin.prevout.n < prev.vout.size()) return IsDenominatedAmount(prev.vout[txin.prevout.n].nValue);
941  }
942  }
943  return false;
944 }

969 bool CWallet::IsChange(const CTxOut& txout) const
970 {
971  // TODO: fix handling of 'change' outputs. The assumption is that any
972  // payment to a script that is ours, but is not in the address book
973  // is change. That assumption is likely to break when we implement multisignature
974  // wallets that return change back into a multi-signature-protected address;
975  // a better way of identifying which outputs are 'the send' and which are
976  // 'the change' will need to be implemented (maybe extend CWalletTx to remember
977  // which output, if any, was change).
978  if (::IsMine(*this, txout.scriptPubKey)) {
979  CTxDestination address;
980  if (!ExtractDestination(txout.scriptPubKey, address))
981  return true;
982 
983  LOCK(cs_wallet);
984  if (!mapAddressBook.count(address))
985  return true;
986  }
987  return false;
988 }

996 int64_t CWalletTx::GetComputedTxTime() const
997 {
998  int64_t nTime = GetTxTime();
999  if (IsZerocoinSpend() || IsZerocoinMint()) {
1000  if (IsInMainChain())
1001  return mapBlockIndex.at(hashBlock)->GetBlockTime();
1002  else
1003  return nTimeReceived;
1004  }
1005  return nTime;

1008 int CWalletTx::GetRequestCount() const
1009 {
1010  // Returns -1 if it wasn't being tracked
1011  int nRequests = -1;
1012  {
1013  LOCK(pwallet->cs_wallet);
1014  if (IsCoinBase()) {
1015  // Generated block
1016  if (hashBlock != 0) {
1017  map<uint256, int>::const_iterator mi = pwallet->mapRequestCount.find(hashBlock);
1018  if (mi != pwallet->mapRequestCount.end())
1019  nRequests = (*mi).second;
1020  }
1021  } else {
1022  // Did anyone request this transaction?
1023  map<uint256, int>::const_iterator mi = pwallet->mapRequestCount.find(GetHash());
1024  if (mi != pwallet->mapRequestCount.end()) {
1025  nRequests = (*mi).second;
1026 
1027  // How about the block it's in?
1028  if (nRequests == 0 && hashBlock != 0) {
1029  map<uint256, int>::const_iterator mi = pwallet->mapRequestCount.find(hashBlock);
1030  if (mi != pwallet->mapRequestCount.end())
1031  nRequests = (*mi).second;
1032  else
1033  nRequests = 1; // If it's in someone else's block it must have got out
1034  }
1035  }
1036  }
1037  }
1038  return nRequests;
1039 }
1040 
1041 void CWalletTx::GetAmounts(list<COutputEntry>& listReceived,
1042  list<COutputEntry>& listSent,
1043  CAmount& nFee,
1044  string& strSentAccount,
1045  const isminefilter& filter) const
1046 {
1047  nFee = 0;
1048  listReceived.clear();
1049  listSent.clear();
1050  strSentAccount = strFromAccount;
1051 
1052  // Compute fee:
1053  CAmount nDebit = GetDebit(filter);
1054  if (nDebit > 0) // debit>0 means we signed/sent this transaction
1055  {
1056  CAmount nValueOut = GetValueOut();
1057  nFee = nDebit - nValueOut;
1058  }
1059 
1060  // Sent/received.
1061  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < vout.size(); ++i) {
1062  const CTxOut& txout = vout[i];
1063  isminetype fIsMine = pwallet->IsMine(txout);
1064  // Only need to handle txouts if AT LEAST one of these is true:
1065  // 1) they debit from us (sent)
1066  // 2) the output is to us (received)
1067  if (nDebit > 0) {
1068  // Don't report 'change' txouts
1069  if (pwallet->IsChange(txout))
1070  continue;
1071  } else if (!(fIsMine & filter) && !IsZerocoinSpend())
1072  continue;
1073 
1074  // In either case, we need to get the destination address
1075  CTxDestination address;
1076  if (txout.scriptPubKey.IsZerocoinMint()) {
1077  address = CNoDestination();
1078  } else if (!ExtractDestination(txout.scriptPubKey, address)) {
1079  if (!IsCoinStake() && !IsCoinBase()) {
1080  LogPrintf("CWalletTx::GetAmounts: Unknown transaction type found, txid %s\n", this->GetHash().ToString());
1081  }
1082  address = CNoDestination();
1083  }
1084 
1085  COutputEntry output = {address, txout.nValue, (int)i};
1086 
1087  // If we are debited by the transaction, add the output as a "sent" entry
1088  if (nDebit > 0)
1089  listSent.push_back(output);
1090 
1091  // If we are receiving the output, add it as a "received" entry
1092  if (fIsMine & filter)
1093  listReceived.push_back(output);
1094  }
1095 }
1096 
1097 void CWalletTx::GetAccountAmounts(const string& strAccount, CAmount& nReceived, CAmount& nSent, CAmount& nFee, const isminefilter& filter) const
1098 {
1099  nReceived = nSent = nFee = 0;
1100 
1101  CAmount allFee;
1102  string strSentAccount;
1103  list<COutputEntry> listReceived;
1104  list<COutputEntry> listSent;
1105  GetAmounts(listReceived, listSent, allFee, strSentAccount, filter);
1106 
1107  if (strAccount == strSentAccount) {
1108  BOOST_FOREACH (const COutputEntry& s, listSent)
1109  nSent += s.amount;
1110  nFee = allFee;
1111  }
1112  {
1113  LOCK(pwallet->cs_wallet);
1114  BOOST_FOREACH (const COutputEntry& r, listReceived) {
1115  if (pwallet->mapAddressBook.count(r.destination)) {
1116  map<CTxDestination, CAddressBookData>::const_iterator mi = pwallet->mapAddressBook.find(r.destination);
1117  if (mi != pwallet->mapAddressBook.end() && (*mi).second.name == strAccount)
1118  nReceived += r.amount;
1119  } else if (strAccount.empty()) {
1120  nReceived += r.amount;
1121  }
1122  }
1123  }
1124 }

1131 
1137 int CWallet::ScanForWalletTransactions(CBlockIndex* pindexStart, bool fUpdate)
1138 {
1139  int ret = 0;
1140  int64_t nNow = GetTime();
1141 
1142  CBlockIndex* pindex = pindexStart;
1143  {
1144  LOCK2(cs_main, cs_wallet);
1145 
1146  // no need to read and scan block, if block was created before
1147  // our wallet birthday (as adjusted for block time variability)
1148  while (pindex && nTimeFirstKey && (pindex->GetBlockTime() < (nTimeFirstKey - 7200)))
1149  pindex = chainActive.Next(pindex);
1150 
1151  ShowProgress(_("Rescanning..."), 0); // show rescan progress in GUI as dialog or on splashscreen, if -rescan on startup
1152  double dProgressStart = Checkpoints::GuessVerificationProgress(pindex, false);
1153  double dProgressTip = Checkpoints::GuessVerificationProgress(chainActive.Tip(), false);
1154  while (pindex) {
1155  if (pindex->nHeight % 100 == 0 && dProgressTip - dProgressStart > 0.0)
1156  ShowProgress(_("Rescanning..."), std::max(1, std::min(99, (int)((Checkpoints::GuessVerificationProgress(pindex, false) - dProgressStart) / (dProgressTip - dProgressStart) * 100))));
1157 
1158  CBlock block;
1159  ReadBlockFromDisk(block, pindex);
1160  BOOST_FOREACH (CTransaction& tx, block.vtx) {
1161  if (AddToWalletIfInvolvingMe(tx, &block, fUpdate))
1162  ret++;
1163  }
1164  pindex = chainActive.Next(pindex);
1165  if (GetTime() >= nNow + 60) {
1166  nNow = GetTime();
1167  LogPrintf("Still rescanning. At block %d. Progress=%f\n", pindex->nHeight, Checkpoints::GuessVerificationProgress(pindex));
1168  }
1169  }
1170  ShowProgress(_("Rescanning..."), 100); // hide progress dialog in GUI
1171  }
1172  return ret;
1173 }
1174 
1175 void CWallet::ReacceptWalletTransactions()
1176 {
1177  LOCK2(cs_main, cs_wallet);
1178  BOOST_FOREACH (PAIRTYPE(const uint256, CWalletTx) & item, mapWallet) {
1179  const uint256& wtxid = item.first;
1180  CWalletTx& wtx = item.second;
1181  assert(wtx.GetHash() == wtxid);
1182 
1183  int nDepth = wtx.GetDepthInMainChain();
1184 
1185  if (!wtx.IsCoinBase() && nDepth < 0) {
1186  // Try to add to memory pool
1187  LOCK(mempool.cs);
1188  wtx.AcceptToMemoryPool(false);
1189  }
1190  }
1191 }

1202 void CWalletTx::RelayWalletTransaction(std::string strCommand)
1203 {
1204  if (!IsCoinBase()) {
1205  if (GetDepthInMainChain() == 0) {
1206  uint256 hash = GetHash();
1207  LogPrintf("Relaying wtx %s\n", hash.ToString());
1208 
1209  if (strCommand == "ix") {
1210  mapTxLockReq.insert(make_pair(hash, (CTransaction) * this));
1211  CreateNewLock(((CTransaction) * this));
1212  RelayTransactionLockReq((CTransaction) * this, true);
1213  } else {
1214  RelayTransaction((CTransaction) * this);
1215  }
1216  }
1217  }
1218 }

1220 set<uint256> CWalletTx::GetConflicts() const
1221 {
1222  set<uint256> result;
1223  if (pwallet != NULL) {
1224  uint256 myHash = GetHash();
1225  result = pwallet->GetConflicts(myHash);
1226  result.erase(myHash);
1227  }
1228  return result;
1229 }
1230 
1231 void CWallet::ResendWalletTransactions()
1232 {
1233  // Do this infrequently and randomly to avoid giving away
1234  // that these are our transactions.
1235  if (GetTime() < nNextResend)
1236  return;
1237  bool fFirst = (nNextResend == 0);
1238  nNextResend = GetTime() + GetRand(30 * 60);
1239  if (fFirst)
1240  return;
1241 
1242  // Only do it if there's been a new block since last time
1243  if (nTimeBestReceived < nLastResend)
1244  return;
1245  nLastResend = GetTime();
1246 
1247  // Rebroadcast any of our txes that aren't in a block yet
1248  LogPrintf("ResendWalletTransactions()\n");
1249  {
1250  LOCK(cs_wallet);
1251  // Sort them in chronological order
1252  multimap<unsigned int, CWalletTx*> mapSorted;
1253  BOOST_FOREACH (PAIRTYPE(const uint256, CWalletTx) & item, mapWallet) {
1254  CWalletTx& wtx = item.second;
1255  // Don't rebroadcast until it's had plenty of time that
1256  // it should have gotten in already by now.
1257  if (nTimeBestReceived - (int64_t)wtx.nTimeReceived > 5 * 60)
1258  mapSorted.insert(make_pair(wtx.nTimeReceived, &wtx));
1259  }
1260  BOOST_FOREACH (PAIRTYPE(const unsigned int, CWalletTx*) & item, mapSorted) {
1261  CWalletTx& wtx = *item.second;
1262  wtx.RelayWalletTransaction();
1263  }
1264  }
1265 }
1266  // end of mapWallet
1268

1281  const CWalletTx* pcoin = &(*it).second;
1282  if (pcoin->IsTrusted())

1290 CAmount CWallet::GetZerocoinBalance(bool fMatureOnly) const
1291 {
1292  CAmount nTotal = 0;
1294  std::map<libzerocoin::CoinDenomination, unsigned int> myZerocoinSupply;
1295  for (auto& denom : libzerocoin::zerocoinDenomList) {
1296  myZerocoinSupply.insert(make_pair(denom, 0));
1297  }
1298 
1299  {
1300  LOCK2(cs_main, cs_wallet);
1301  // Get Unused coins
1302  list<CZerocoinMint> listPubCoin = CWalletDB(strWalletFile).ListMintedCoins(true, fMatureOnly, true);
1303  for (auto& mint : listPubCoin) {
1304  libzerocoin::CoinDenomination denom = mint.GetDenomination();
1305  nTotal += libzerocoin::ZerocoinDenominationToAmount(denom);
1306  myZerocoinSupply.at(denom)++;
1307  }
1308  }
1309  for (auto& denom : libzerocoin::zerocoinDenomList) {
1310  LogPrint("zero","%s My coins for denomination %d pubcoin %s\n", __func__,denom, myZerocoinSupply.at(denom));
1311  }
1312  LogPrint("zero","Total value of coins %d\n",nTotal);
1313 
1314  if (nTotal < 0 ) nTotal = 0; // Sanity never hurts
1315 
1316  return nTotal;
1317 }

1445 // Note: calculated including unconfirmed,
1446 // that's ok as long as we use it for informational purposes only
1447 double CWallet::GetAverageAnonymizedRounds() const
1448 {
1449  if (fLiteMode) return 0;
1450 
1451  double fTotal = 0;
1452  double fCount = 0;
1453 
1454  {
1455  LOCK2(cs_main, cs_wallet);
1456  for (map<uint256, CWalletTx>::const_iterator it = mapWallet.begin(); it != mapWallet.end(); ++it) {
1457  const CWalletTx* pcoin = &(*it).second;
1458 
1459  uint256 hash = (*it).first;
1460 
1461  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < pcoin->vout.size(); i++) {
1462  CTxIn vin = CTxIn(hash, i);
1463 
1464  if (IsSpent(hash, i) || IsMine(pcoin->vout[i]) != ISMINE_SPENDABLE || !IsDenominated(vin)) continue;
1465 
1466  int rounds = GetInputObfuscationRounds(vin);
1467  fTotal += (float)rounds;
1468  fCount += 1;
1469  }
1470  }
1471  }
1472 
1473  if (fCount == 0) return 0;
1474 
1475  return fTotal / fCount;
1476 }
1477 
1478 // Note: calculated including unconfirmed,
1479 // that's ok as long as we use it for informational purposes only
1480 CAmount CWallet::GetNormalizedAnonymizedBalance() const
1481 {
1482  if (fLiteMode) return 0;
1483 
1484  CAmount nTotal = 0;
1485 
1486  {
1487  LOCK2(cs_main, cs_wallet);
1488  for (map<uint256, CWalletTx>::const_iterator it = mapWallet.begin(); it != mapWallet.end(); ++it) {
1489  const CWalletTx* pcoin = &(*it).second;
1490 
1491  uint256 hash = (*it).first;
1492 
1493  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < pcoin->vout.size(); i++) {
1494  CTxIn vin = CTxIn(hash, i);
1495 
1496  if (IsSpent(hash, i) || IsMine(pcoin->vout[i]) != ISMINE_SPENDABLE || !IsDenominated(vin)) continue;
1497  if (pcoin->GetDepthInMainChain() < 0) continue;
1498 
1499  int rounds = GetInputObfuscationRounds(vin);
1500  nTotal += pcoin->vout[i].nValue * rounds / nZeromintPercentage;
1501  }
1502  }
1503  }
1504 
1505  return nTotal;
1506 }

1597 void CWallet::AvailableCoins(vector<COutput>& vCoins, bool fOnlyConfirmed, const CCoinControl* coinControl, bool fIncludeZeroValue, AvailableCoinsType nCoinType, bool fUseIX) const
1598 {
1599  vCoins.clear();
1600 
1601  {
1602  LOCK2(cs_main, cs_wallet);
1603  for (map<uint256, CWalletTx>::const_iterator it = mapWallet.begin(); it != mapWallet.end(); ++it) {
1604  const uint256& wtxid = it->first;
1605  const CWalletTx* pcoin = &(*it).second;
1606 
1607  if (!CheckFinalTx(*pcoin))
1608  continue;
1609 
1610  if (fOnlyConfirmed && !pcoin->IsTrusted())
1611  continue;
1612 
1613  if ((pcoin->IsCoinBase() || pcoin->IsCoinStake()) && pcoin->GetBlocksToMaturity() > 0)
1614  continue;
1615 
1616  int nDepth = pcoin->GetDepthInMainChain(false);
1617  // do not use IX for inputs that have less then 6 blockchain confirmations
1618  if (fUseIX && nDepth < 6)
1619  continue;
1620 
1621  // We should not consider coins which aren't at least in our mempool
1622  // It's possible for these to be conflicted via ancestors which we may never be able to detect
1623  if (nDepth == 0 && !pcoin->InMempool())
1624  continue;
1625 
1626  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < pcoin->vout.size(); i++) {
1627  bool found = false;
1628  if (nCoinType == ONLY_DENOMINATED) {
1629  found = IsDenominatedAmount(pcoin->vout[i].nValue);
1630  } else if (nCoinType == ONLY_NOT10000IFMN) {
1631  found = !(fMasterNode && pcoin->vout[i].nValue == 10000 * COIN);
1632  } else if (nCoinType == ONLY_NONDENOMINATED_NOT10000IFMN) {
1633  if (IsCollateralAmount(pcoin->vout[i].nValue)) continue; // do not use collateral amounts
1634  found = !IsDenominatedAmount(pcoin->vout[i].nValue);
1635  if (found && fMasterNode) found = pcoin->vout[i].nValue != 10000 * COIN; // do not use Hot MN funds
1636  } else if (nCoinType == ONLY_10000) {
1637  found = pcoin->vout[i].nValue == 10000 * COIN;
1638  } else {
1639  found = true;
1640  }
1641  if (!found) continue;
1642 
1643  if (nCoinType == STAKABLE_COINS) {
1644  if (pcoin->vout[i].IsZerocoinMint())
1645  continue;
1646  }
1647 
1648  isminetype mine = IsMine(pcoin->vout[i]);
1649  if (IsSpent(wtxid, i))
1650  continue;
1651  if (mine == ISMINE_NO)
1652  continue;
1653  if (mine == ISMINE_WATCH_ONLY)
1654  continue;
1655 
1656  if (IsLockedCoin((*it).first, i) && nCoinType != ONLY_10000)
1657  continue;
1658  if (pcoin->vout[i].nValue <= 0 && !fIncludeZeroValue)
1659  continue;
1660  if (coinControl && coinControl->HasSelected() && !coinControl->fAllowOtherInputs && !coinControl->IsSelected((*it).first, i))
1661  continue;
1662 
1663  bool fIsSpendable = false;
1664  if ((mine & ISMINE_SPENDABLE) != ISMINE_NO)
1665  fIsSpendable = true;
1666  if ((mine & ISMINE_MULTISIG) != ISMINE_NO)
1667  fIsSpendable = true;
1668  vCoins.emplace_back(COutput(pcoin, i, nDepth, fIsSpendable));
1669  }
1670  }
1671  }
1672 }
1673 
1674 map<CBitcoinAddress, vector<COutput> > CWallet::AvailableCoinsByAddress(bool fConfirmed, CAmount maxCoinValue)
1675 {
1676  vector<COutput> vCoins;
1677  AvailableCoins(vCoins, fConfirmed);
1678 
1679  map<CBitcoinAddress, vector<COutput> > mapCoins;
1680  BOOST_FOREACH (COutput out, vCoins) {
1681  if (maxCoinValue > 0 && out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue > maxCoinValue)
1682  continue;
1683 
1684  CTxDestination address;
1685  if (!ExtractDestination(out.tx->vout[out.i].scriptPubKey, address))
1686  continue;
1687 
1688  mapCoins[CBitcoinAddress(address)].push_back(out);
1689  }
1690 
1691  return mapCoins;
1692 }
1693 
1694 static void ApproximateBestSubset(vector<pair<CAmount, pair<const CWalletTx*, unsigned int> > > vValue, const CAmount& nTotalLower, const CAmount& nTargetValue, vector<char>& vfBest, CAmount& nBest, int iterations = 1000)
1695 {
1696  vector<char> vfIncluded;
1697 
1698  vfBest.assign(vValue.size(), true);
1699  nBest = nTotalLower;
1700 
1701  seed_insecure_rand();
1702 
1703  for (int nRep = 0; nRep < iterations && nBest != nTargetValue; nRep++) {
1704  vfIncluded.assign(vValue.size(), false);
1705  CAmount nTotal = 0;
1706  bool fReachedTarget = false;
1707  for (int nPass = 0; nPass < 2 && !fReachedTarget; nPass++) {
1708  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < vValue.size(); i++) {
1709  //The solver here uses a randomized algorithm,
1710  //the randomness serves no real security purpose but is just
1711  //needed to prevent degenerate behavior and it is important
1712  //that the rng is fast. We do not use a constant random sequence,
1713  //because there may be some privacy improvement by making
1714  //the selection random.
1715  if (nPass == 0 ? insecure_rand() & 1 : !vfIncluded[i]) {
1716  nTotal += vValue[i].first;
1717  vfIncluded[i] = true;
1718  if (nTotal >= nTargetValue) {
1719  fReachedTarget = true;
1720  if (nTotal < nBest) {
1721  nBest = nTotal;
1722  vfBest = vfIncluded;
1723  }
1724  nTotal -= vValue[i].first;
1725  vfIncluded[i] = false;
1726  }
1727  }
1728  }
1729  }
1730  }
1731 }
1732 
1733 
1734 // TODO: find appropriate place for this sort function
1735 // move denoms down
1736 bool less_then_denom(const COutput& out1, const COutput& out2)
1737 {
1738  const CWalletTx* pcoin1 = out1.tx;
1739  const CWalletTx* pcoin2 = out2.tx;
1740 
1741  bool found1 = false;
1742  bool found2 = false;
1743  BOOST_FOREACH (CAmount d, obfuScationDenominations) // loop through predefined denoms
1744  {
1745  if (pcoin1->vout[out1.i].nValue == d) found1 = true;
1746  if (pcoin2->vout[out2.i].nValue == d) found2 = true;
1747  }
1748  return (!found1 && found2);
1749 }

1751 bool CWallet::SelectStakeCoins(std::set<std::pair<const CWalletTx*, unsigned int> >& setCoins, CAmount nTargetAmount) const
1752 {
1753  vector<COutput> vCoins;
1754  AvailableCoins(vCoins, true, NULL, false, STAKABLE_COINS);
1755  CAmount nAmountSelected = 0;
1756 
1757  for (const COutput& out : vCoins) {
1758  //make sure not to outrun target amount
1759  if (nAmountSelected + out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue > nTargetAmount)
1760  continue;
1761 
1762  //if zerocoinspend, then use the block time
1763  int64_t nTxTime = out.tx->GetTxTime();
1764  if (out.tx->IsZerocoinSpend()) {
1765  if (!out.tx->IsInMainChain())
1766  continue;
1767  nTxTime = mapBlockIndex.at(out.tx->hashBlock)->GetBlockTime();
1768  }
1769 
1770  //check for min age
1771  if (GetAdjustedTime() - nTxTime < nStakeMinAge)
1772  continue;
1773 
1774  //check that it is matured
1775  if (out.nDepth < (out.tx->IsCoinStake() ? Params().COINBASE_MATURITY() : 10))
1776  continue;
1777 
1778  //add to our stake set
1779  setCoins.insert(make_pair(out.tx, out.i));
1780  nAmountSelected += out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue;
1781  }
1782  return true;
1783 }
1784 
1785 bool CWallet::MintableCoins()
1786 {
1787  CAmount nBalance = GetBalance();
1788  if (mapArgs.count("-reservebalance") && !ParseMoney(mapArgs["-reservebalance"], nReserveBalance))
1789  return error("MintableCoins() : invalid reserve balance amount");
1790  if (nBalance <= nReserveBalance)
1791  return false;
1792 
1793  vector<COutput> vCoins;
1794  AvailableCoins(vCoins, true);
1795 
1796  for (const COutput& out : vCoins) {
1797  int64_t nTxTime = out.tx->GetTxTime();
1798  if (out.tx->IsZerocoinSpend()) {
1799  if (!out.tx->IsInMainChain())
1800  continue;
1801  nTxTime = mapBlockIndex.at(out.tx->hashBlock)->GetBlockTime();
1802  }
1803 
1804  if (GetAdjustedTime() - nTxTime > nStakeMinAge)
1805  return true;
1806  }
1807 
1808  return false;
1809 }

1811 bool CWallet::SelectCoinsMinConf(const CAmount& nTargetValue, int nConfMine, int nConfTheirs, vector<COutput> vCoins, set<pair<const CWalletTx*, unsigned int> >& setCoinsRet, CAmount& nValueRet) const
1812 {
1813  setCoinsRet.clear();
1814  nValueRet = 0;
1815 
1816  // List of values less than target
1817  pair<CAmount, pair<const CWalletTx*, unsigned int> > coinLowestLarger;
1818  coinLowestLarger.first = std::numeric_limits<CAmount>::max();
1819  coinLowestLarger.second.first = NULL;
1820  vector<pair<CAmount, pair<const CWalletTx*, unsigned int> > > vValue;
1821  CAmount nTotalLower = 0;
1822 
1823  random_shuffle(vCoins.begin(), vCoins.end(), GetRandInt);
1824 
1825  // move denoms down on the list
1826  sort(vCoins.begin(), vCoins.end(), less_then_denom);
1827 
1828  // try to find nondenom first to prevent unneeded spending of mixed coins
1829  for (unsigned int tryDenom = 0; tryDenom < 2; tryDenom++) {
1830  if (fDebug) LogPrint("selectcoins", "tryDenom: %d\n", tryDenom);
1831  vValue.clear();
1832  nTotalLower = 0;
1833  BOOST_FOREACH (const COutput& output, vCoins) {
1834  if (!output.fSpendable)
1835  continue;
1836 
1837  const CWalletTx* pcoin = output.tx;
1838 
1839  // if (fDebug) LogPrint("selectcoins", "value %s confirms %d\n", FormatMoney(pcoin->vout[output.i].nValue), output.nDepth);
1840  if (output.nDepth < (pcoin->IsFromMe(ISMINE_ALL) ? nConfMine : nConfTheirs))
1841  continue;
1842 
1843  int i = output.i;
1844  CAmount n = pcoin->vout[i].nValue;
1845  if (tryDenom == 0 && IsDenominatedAmount(n)) continue; // we don't want denom values on first run
1846 
1847  pair<CAmount, pair<const CWalletTx*, unsigned int> > coin = make_pair(n, make_pair(pcoin, i));
1848 
1849  if (n == nTargetValue) {
1850  setCoinsRet.insert(coin.second);
1851  nValueRet += coin.first;
1852  return true;
1853  } else if (n < nTargetValue + CENT) {
1854  vValue.push_back(coin);
1855  nTotalLower += n;
1856  } else if (n < coinLowestLarger.first) {
1857  coinLowestLarger = coin;
1858  }
1859  }
1860 
1861  if (nTotalLower == nTargetValue) {
1862  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < vValue.size(); ++i) {
1863  setCoinsRet.insert(vValue[i].second);
1864  nValueRet += vValue[i].first;
1865  }
1866  return true;
1867  }
1868 
1869  if (nTotalLower < nTargetValue) {
1870  if (coinLowestLarger.second.first == NULL) // there is no input larger than nTargetValue
1871  {
1872  if (tryDenom == 0)
1873  // we didn't look at denom yet, let's do it
1874  continue;
1875  else
1876  // we looked at everything possible and didn't find anything, no luck
1877  return false;
1878  }
1879  setCoinsRet.insert(coinLowestLarger.second);
1880  nValueRet += coinLowestLarger.first;
1881  return true;
1882  }
1883 
1884  // nTotalLower > nTargetValue
1885  break;
1886  }
1887 
1888  // Solve subset sum by stochastic approximation
1889  sort(vValue.rbegin(), vValue.rend(), CompareValueOnly());
1890  vector<char> vfBest;
1891  CAmount nBest;
1892 
1893  ApproximateBestSubset(vValue, nTotalLower, nTargetValue, vfBest, nBest, 1000);
1894  if (nBest != nTargetValue && nTotalLower >= nTargetValue + CENT)
1895  ApproximateBestSubset(vValue, nTotalLower, nTargetValue + CENT, vfBest, nBest, 1000);
1896 
1897  // If we have a bigger coin and (either the stochastic approximation didn't find a good solution,
1898  // or the next bigger coin is closer), return the bigger coin
1899  if (coinLowestLarger.second.first &&
1900  ((nBest != nTargetValue && nBest < nTargetValue + CENT) || coinLowestLarger.first <= nBest)) {
1901  setCoinsRet.insert(coinLowestLarger.second);
1902  nValueRet += coinLowestLarger.first;
1903  } else {
1904  string s = "CWallet::SelectCoinsMinConf best subset: ";
1905  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < vValue.size(); i++) {
1906  if (vfBest[i]) {
1907  setCoinsRet.insert(vValue[i].second);
1908  nValueRet += vValue[i].first;
1909  s += FormatMoney(vValue[i].first) + " ";
1910  }
1911  }
1912  LogPrintf("%s - total %s\n", s, FormatMoney(nBest));
1913  }
1914 
1915  return true;
1916 }
1917 
1918 bool CWallet::SelectCoins(const CAmount& nTargetValue, set<pair<const CWalletTx*, unsigned int> >& setCoinsRet, CAmount& nValueRet, const CCoinControl* coinControl, AvailableCoinsType coin_type, bool useIX) const
1919 {
1920  // Note: this function should never be used for "always free" tx types like dstx
1921 
1922  vector<COutput> vCoins;
1923  AvailableCoins(vCoins, true, coinControl, false, coin_type, useIX);
1924 
1925  // coin control -> return all selected outputs (we want all selected to go into the transaction for sure)
1926  if (coinControl && coinControl->HasSelected()) {
1927  BOOST_FOREACH (const COutput& out, vCoins) {
1928  if (!out.fSpendable)
1929  continue;
1930 
1931  if (coin_type == ONLY_DENOMINATED) {
1932  CTxIn vin = CTxIn(out.tx->GetHash(), out.i);
1933  int rounds = GetInputObfuscationRounds(vin);
1934  // make sure it's actually anonymized
1935  if (rounds < nZeromintPercentage) continue;
1936  }
1937 
1938  nValueRet += out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue;
1939  setCoinsRet.insert(make_pair(out.tx, out.i));
1940  }
1941  return (nValueRet >= nTargetValue);
1942  }
1943 
1944  //if we're doing only denominated, we need to round up to the nearest .1 DIV
1945  if (coin_type == ONLY_DENOMINATED) {
1946  // Make outputs by looping through denominations, from large to small
1947  BOOST_FOREACH (CAmount v, obfuScationDenominations) {
1948  BOOST_FOREACH (const COutput& out, vCoins) {
1949  if (out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue == v //make sure it's the denom we're looking for
1950  && nValueRet + out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue < nTargetValue + (0.1 * COIN) + 100 //round the amount up to .1 DIV over
1951  ) {
1952  CTxIn vin = CTxIn(out.tx->GetHash(), out.i);
1953  int rounds = GetInputObfuscationRounds(vin);
1954  // make sure it's actually anonymized
1955  if (rounds < nZeromintPercentage) continue;
1956  nValueRet += out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue;
1957  setCoinsRet.insert(make_pair(out.tx, out.i));
1958  }
1959  }
1960  }
1961  return (nValueRet >= nTargetValue);
1962  }
1963 
1964  return (SelectCoinsMinConf(nTargetValue, 1, 6, vCoins, setCoinsRet, nValueRet) ||
1965  SelectCoinsMinConf(nTargetValue, 1, 1, vCoins, setCoinsRet, nValueRet) ||
1966  (bSpendZeroConfChange && SelectCoinsMinConf(nTargetValue, 0, 1, vCoins, setCoinsRet, nValueRet)));
1967 }
1968 
1969 struct CompareByPriority {
1970  bool operator()(const COutput& t1,
1971  const COutput& t2) const
1972  {
1973  return t1.Priority() > t2.Priority();
1974  }
1975 };

1977 bool CWallet::SelectCoinsByDenominations(int nDenom, CAmount nValueMin, CAmount nValueMax, std::vector<CTxIn>& vCoinsRet, std::vector<COutput>& vCoinsRet2, CAmount& nValueRet, int nObfuscationRoundsMin, int nObfuscationRoundsMax)
1978 {
1979  vCoinsRet.clear();
1980  nValueRet = 0;
1981 
1982  vCoinsRet2.clear();
1983  vector<COutput> vCoins;
1984  AvailableCoins(vCoins, true, NULL, ONLY_DENOMINATED);
1985 
1986  std::random_shuffle(vCoins.rbegin(), vCoins.rend());
1987 
1988  //keep track of each denomination that we have
1989  bool fFound10000 = false;
1990  bool fFound1000 = false;
1991  bool fFound100 = false;
1992  bool fFound10 = false;
1993  bool fFound1 = false;
1994  bool fFoundDot1 = false;
1995 
1996  //Check to see if any of the denomination are off, in that case mark them as fulfilled
1997  if (!(nDenom & (1 << 0))) fFound10000 = true;
1998  if (!(nDenom & (1 << 1))) fFound1000 = true;
1999  if (!(nDenom & (1 << 2))) fFound100 = true;
2000  if (!(nDenom & (1 << 3))) fFound10 = true;
2001  if (!(nDenom & (1 << 4))) fFound1 = true;
2002  if (!(nDenom & (1 << 5))) fFoundDot1 = true;
2003 
2004  BOOST_FOREACH (const COutput& out, vCoins) {
2005  // masternode-like input should not be selected by AvailableCoins now anyway
2006  //if(out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue == 10000*COIN) continue;
2007  if (nValueRet + out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue <= nValueMax) {
2008  bool fAccepted = false;
2009 
2010  // Function returns as follows:
2011  //
2012  // bit 0 - 10000 DIV+1 ( bit on if present )
2013  // bit 1 - 1000 DIV+1
2014  // bit 2 - 100 DIV+1
2015  // bit 3 - 10 DIV+1
2016  // bit 4 - 1 DIV+1
2017  // bit 5 - .1 DIV+1
2018 
2019  CTxIn vin = CTxIn(out.tx->GetHash(), out.i);
2020 
2021  int rounds = GetInputObfuscationRounds(vin);
2022  if (rounds >= nObfuscationRoundsMax) continue;
2023  if (rounds < nObfuscationRoundsMin) continue;
2024 
2025  if (fFound10000 && fFound1000 && fFound100 && fFound10 && fFound1 && fFoundDot1) { //if fulfilled
2026  //we can return this for submission
2027  if (nValueRet >= nValueMin) {
2028  //random reduce the max amount we'll submit for anonymity
2029  nValueMax -= (rand() % (nValueMax / 5));
2030  //on average use 50% of the inputs or less
2031  int r = (rand() % (int)vCoins.size());
2032  if ((int)vCoinsRet.size() > r) return true;
2033  }
2034  //Denomination criterion has been met, we can take any matching denominations
2035  if ((nDenom & (1 << 0)) && out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue == ((10000 * COIN) + 10000000)) {
2036  fAccepted = true;
2037  } else if ((nDenom & (1 << 1)) && out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue == ((1000 * COIN) + 1000000)) {
2038  fAccepted = true;
2039  } else if ((nDenom & (1 << 2)) && out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue == ((100 * COIN) + 100000)) {
2040  fAccepted = true;
2041  } else if ((nDenom & (1 << 3)) && out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue == ((10 * COIN) + 10000)) {
2042  fAccepted = true;
2043  } else if ((nDenom & (1 << 4)) && out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue == ((1 * COIN) + 1000)) {
2044  fAccepted = true;
2045  } else if ((nDenom & (1 << 5)) && out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue == ((.1 * COIN) + 100)) {
2046  fAccepted = true;
2047  }
2048  } else {
2049  //Criterion has not been satisfied, we will only take 1 of each until it is.
2050  if ((nDenom & (1 << 0)) && out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue == ((10000 * COIN) + 10000000)) {
2051  fAccepted = true;
2052  fFound10000 = true;
2053  } else if ((nDenom & (1 << 1)) && out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue == ((1000 * COIN) + 1000000)) {
2054  fAccepted = true;
2055  fFound1000 = true;
2056  } else if ((nDenom & (1 << 2)) && out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue == ((100 * COIN) + 100000)) {
2057  fAccepted = true;
2058  fFound100 = true;
2059  } else if ((nDenom & (1 << 3)) && out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue == ((10 * COIN) + 10000)) {
2060  fAccepted = true;
2061  fFound10 = true;
2062  } else if ((nDenom & (1 << 4)) && out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue == ((1 * COIN) + 1000)) {
2063  fAccepted = true;
2064  fFound1 = true;
2065  } else if ((nDenom & (1 << 5)) && out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue == ((.1 * COIN) + 100)) {
2066  fAccepted = true;
2067  fFoundDot1 = true;
2068  }
2069  }
2070  if (!fAccepted) continue;
2071 
2072  vin.prevPubKey = out.tx->vout[out.i].scriptPubKey; // the inputs PubKey
2073  nValueRet += out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue;
2074  vCoinsRet.push_back(vin);
2075  vCoinsRet2.push_back(out);
2076  }
2077  }
2078 
2079  return (nValueRet >= nValueMin && fFound10000 && fFound1000 && fFound100 && fFound10 && fFound1 && fFoundDot1);
2080 }

2082 bool CWallet::SelectCoinsDark(CAmount nValueMin, CAmount nValueMax, std::vector<CTxIn>& setCoinsRet, CAmount& nValueRet, int nObfuscationRoundsMin, int nObfuscationRoundsMax) const
2083 {
2084  CCoinControl* coinControl = NULL;
2085 
2086  setCoinsRet.clear();
2087  nValueRet = 0;
2088 
2089  vector<COutput> vCoins;
2090  AvailableCoins(vCoins, true, coinControl, nObfuscationRoundsMin < 0 ? ONLY_NONDENOMINATED_NOT10000IFMN : ONLY_DENOMINATED);
2091 
2092  set<pair<const CWalletTx*, unsigned int> > setCoinsRet2;
2093 
2094  //order the array so largest nondenom are first, then denominations, then very small inputs.
2095  sort(vCoins.rbegin(), vCoins.rend(), CompareByPriority());
2096 
2097  BOOST_FOREACH (const COutput& out, vCoins) {
2098  //do not allow inputs less than 1 CENT
2099  if (out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue < CENT) continue;
2100  //do not allow collaterals to be selected
2101  if (IsCollateralAmount(out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue)) continue;
2102  if (fMasterNode && out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue == 10000 * COIN) continue; //masternode input
2103 
2104  if (nValueRet + out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue <= nValueMax) {
2105  CTxIn vin = CTxIn(out.tx->GetHash(), out.i);
2106 
2107  int rounds = GetInputObfuscationRounds(vin);
2108  if (rounds >= nObfuscationRoundsMax) continue;
2109  if (rounds < nObfuscationRoundsMin) continue;
2110 
2111  vin.prevPubKey = out.tx->vout[out.i].scriptPubKey; // the inputs PubKey
2112  nValueRet += out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue;
2113  setCoinsRet.push_back(vin);
2114  setCoinsRet2.insert(make_pair(out.tx, out.i));
2115  }
2116  }
2117 
2118  // if it's more than min, we're good to return
2119  if (nValueRet >= nValueMin) return true;
2120 
2121  return false;
2122 }

2195 bool CWallet::CreateCollateralTransaction(CMutableTransaction& txCollateral, std::string& strReason)
2196 {
2197  /*
2198  To doublespend a collateral transaction, it will require a fee higher than this. So there's
2199  still a significant cost.
2200  */
2201  CAmount nFeeRet = 1 * COIN;
2202 
2203  txCollateral.vin.clear();
2204  txCollateral.vout.clear();
2205 
2206  CReserveKey reservekey(this);
2207  CAmount nValueIn2 = 0;
2208  std::vector<CTxIn> vCoinsCollateral;
2209 
2210  if (!SelectCoinsCollateral(vCoinsCollateral, nValueIn2)) {
2211  strReason = "Error: Obfuscation requires a collateral transaction and could not locate an acceptable input!";
2212  return false;
2213  }
2214 
2215  // make our change address
2216  CScript scriptChange;
2217  CPubKey vchPubKey;
2218  assert(reservekey.GetReservedKey(vchPubKey)); // should never fail, as we just unlocked
2219  scriptChange = GetScriptForDestination(vchPubKey.GetID());
2220  reservekey.KeepKey();
2221 
2222  BOOST_FOREACH (CTxIn v, vCoinsCollateral)
2223  txCollateral.vin.push_back(v);
2224 
2225  if (nValueIn2 - OBFUSCATION_COLLATERAL - nFeeRet > 0) {
2226  //pay collateral charge in fees
2227  CTxOut vout3 = CTxOut(nValueIn2 - OBFUSCATION_COLLATERAL, scriptChange);
2228  txCollateral.vout.push_back(vout3);
2229  }
2230 
2231  int vinNumber = 0;
2232  BOOST_FOREACH (CTxIn v, txCollateral.vin) {
2233  if (!SignSignature(*this, v.prevPubKey, txCollateral, vinNumber, int(SIGHASH_ALL | SIGHASH_ANYONECANPAY))) {
2234  BOOST_FOREACH (CTxIn v, vCoinsCollateral)
2235  UnlockCoin(v.prevout);
2236 
2237  strReason = "CObfuscationPool::Sign - Unable to sign collateral transaction! \n";
2238  return false;
2239  }
2240  vinNumber++;
2241  }
2242 
2243  return true;
2244 }

2295 bool CWallet::CreateTransaction(const vector<pair<CScript, CAmount> >& vecSend,
2296  CWalletTx& wtxNew,
2297  CReserveKey& reservekey,
2298  CAmount& nFeeRet,
2299  std::string& strFailReason,
2300  const CCoinControl* coinControl,
2301  AvailableCoinsType coin_type,
2302  bool useIX,
2303  CAmount nFeePay)
2304 {
2305  if (useIX && nFeePay < CENT) nFeePay = CENT;
2306 
2307  CAmount nValue = 0;
2308 
2309  BOOST_FOREACH (const PAIRTYPE(CScript, CAmount) & s, vecSend) {
2310  if (nValue < 0) {
2311  strFailReason = _("Transaction amounts must be positive");
2312  return false;
2313  }
2314  nValue += s.second;
2315  }
2316  if (vecSend.empty() || nValue < 0) {
2317  strFailReason = _("Transaction amounts must be positive");
2318  return false;
2319  }
2320 
2321  wtxNew.fTimeReceivedIsTxTime = true;
2322  wtxNew.BindWallet(this);
2323  CMutableTransaction txNew;
2324 
2325  {
2326  LOCK2(cs_main, cs_wallet);
2327  {
2328  nFeeRet = 0;
2329  if (nFeePay > 0) nFeeRet = nFeePay;
2330  while (true) {
2331  txNew.vin.clear();
2332  txNew.vout.clear();
2333  wtxNew.fFromMe = true;
2334 
2335  CAmount nTotalValue = nValue + nFeeRet;
2336  double dPriority = 0;
2337 
2338  // vouts to the payees
2339  if (coinControl && !coinControl->fSplitBlock) {
2340  BOOST_FOREACH (const PAIRTYPE(CScript, CAmount) & s, vecSend) {
2341  CTxOut txout(s.second, s.first);
2342  if (txout.IsDust(::minRelayTxFee)) {
2343  strFailReason = _("Transaction amount too small");
2344  return false;
2345  }
2346  txNew.vout.push_back(txout);
2347  }
2348  } else //UTXO Splitter Transaction
2349  {
2350  int nSplitBlock;
2351 
2352  if (coinControl)
2353  nSplitBlock = coinControl->nSplitBlock;
2354  else
2355  nSplitBlock = 1;
2356 
2357  BOOST_FOREACH (const PAIRTYPE(CScript, CAmount) & s, vecSend) {
2358  for (int i = 0; i < nSplitBlock; i++) {
2359  if (i == nSplitBlock - 1) {
2360  uint64_t nRemainder = s.second % nSplitBlock;
2361  txNew.vout.push_back(CTxOut((s.second / nSplitBlock) + nRemainder, s.first));
2362  } else
2363  txNew.vout.push_back(CTxOut(s.second / nSplitBlock, s.first));
2364  }
2365  }
2366  }
2367 
2368  // Choose coins to use
2369  set<pair<const CWalletTx*, unsigned int> > setCoins;
2370  CAmount nValueIn = 0;
2371 
2372  if (!SelectCoins(nTotalValue, setCoins, nValueIn, coinControl, coin_type, useIX)) {
2373  if (coin_type == ALL_COINS) {
2374  strFailReason = _("Insufficient funds.");
2375  } else if (coin_type == ONLY_NOT10000IFMN) {
2376  strFailReason = _("Unable to locate enough funds for this transaction that are not equal 10000 DIV.");
2377  } else if (coin_type == ONLY_NONDENOMINATED_NOT10000IFMN) {
2378  strFailReason = _("Unable to locate enough Obfuscation non-denominated funds for this transaction that are not equal 10000 DIV.");
2379  } else {
2380  strFailReason = _("Unable to locate enough Obfuscation denominated funds for this transaction.");
2381  strFailReason += " " + _("Obfuscation uses exact denominated amounts to send funds, you might simply need to anonymize some more coins.");
2382  }
2383 
2384  if (useIX) {
2385  strFailReason += " " + _("SwiftX requires inputs with at least 6 confirmations, you might need to wait a few minutes and try again.");
2386  }
2387 
2388  return false;
2389  }
2390 
2391 
2392  BOOST_FOREACH (PAIRTYPE(const CWalletTx*, unsigned int) pcoin, setCoins) {
2393  CAmount nCredit = pcoin.first->vout[pcoin.second].nValue;
2394  //The coin age after the next block (depth+1) is used instead of the current,
2395  //reflecting an assumption the user would accept a bit more delay for
2396  //a chance at a free transaction.
2397  //But mempool inputs might still be in the mempool, so their age stays 0
2398  int age = pcoin.first->GetDepthInMainChain();
2399  if (age != 0)
2400  age += 1;
2401  dPriority += (double)nCredit * age;
2402  }
2403 
2404  CAmount nChange = nValueIn - nValue - nFeeRet;
2405 
2406  //over pay for denominated transactions
2407  if (coin_type == ONLY_DENOMINATED) {
2408  nFeeRet += nChange;
2409  nChange = 0;
2410  wtxNew.mapValue["DS"] = "1";
2411  }
2412 
2413  if (nChange > 0) {
2414  // Fill a vout to ourself
2415  // TODO: pass in scriptChange instead of reservekey so
2416  // change transaction isn't always pay-to-divi-address
2417  CScript scriptChange;
2418 
2419  // coin control: send change to custom address
2420  if (coinControl && !boost::get<CNoDestination>(&coinControl->destChange))
2421  scriptChange = GetScriptForDestination(coinControl->destChange);
2422 
2423  // no coin control: send change to newly generated address
2424  else {
2425  // Note: We use a new key here to keep it from being obvious which side is the change.
2426  // The drawback is that by not reusing a previous key, the change may be lost if a
2427  // backup is restored, if the backup doesn't have the new private key for the change.
2428  // If we reused the old key, it would be possible to add code to look for and
2429  // rediscover unknown transactions that were written with keys of ours to recover
2430  // post-backup change.
2431 
2432  // Reserve a new key pair from key pool
2433  CPubKey vchPubKey;
2434  bool ret;
2435  ret = reservekey.GetReservedKey(vchPubKey);
2436  assert(ret); // should never fail, as we just unlocked
2437 
2438  scriptChange = GetScriptForDestination(vchPubKey.GetID());
2439  }
2440 
2441  CTxOut newTxOut(nChange, scriptChange);
2442 
2443  // Never create dust outputs; if we would, just
2444  // add the dust to the fee.
2445  if (newTxOut.IsDust(::minRelayTxFee)) {
2446  nFeeRet += nChange;
2447  nChange = 0;
2448  reservekey.ReturnKey();
2449  } else {
2450  // Insert change txn at random position:
2451  vector<CTxOut>::iterator position = txNew.vout.begin() + GetRandInt(txNew.vout.size() + 1);
2452  txNew.vout.insert(position, newTxOut);
2453  }
2454  } else
2455  reservekey.ReturnKey();
2456 
2457  // Fill vin
2458  BOOST_FOREACH (const PAIRTYPE(const CWalletTx*, unsigned int) & coin, setCoins)
2459  txNew.vin.push_back(CTxIn(coin.first->GetHash(), coin.second));
2460 
2461  // Sign
2462  int nIn = 0;
2463  BOOST_FOREACH (const PAIRTYPE(const CWalletTx*, unsigned int) & coin, setCoins)
2464  if (!SignSignature(*this, *coin.first, txNew, nIn++)) {
2465  strFailReason = _("Signing transaction failed");
2466  return false;
2467  }
2468 
2469  // Embed the constructed transaction data in wtxNew.
2470  *static_cast<CTransaction*>(&wtxNew) = CTransaction(txNew);
2471 
2472  // Limit size
2473  unsigned int nBytes = ::GetSerializeSize(*(CTransaction*)&wtxNew, SER_NETWORK, PROTOCOL_VERSION);
2474  if (nBytes >= MAX_STANDARD_TX_SIZE) {
2475  strFailReason = _("Transaction too large");
2476  return false;
2477  }
2478  dPriority = wtxNew.ComputePriority(dPriority, nBytes);
2479 
2480  // Can we complete this as a free transaction?
2481  if (fSendFreeTransactions && nBytes <= MAX_FREE_TRANSACTION_CREATE_SIZE) {
2482  // Not enough fee: enough priority?
2483  double dPriorityNeeded = mempool.estimatePriority(nTxConfirmTarget);
2484  // Not enough mempool history to estimate: use hard-coded AllowFree.
2485  if (dPriorityNeeded <= 0 && AllowFree(dPriority))
2486  break;
2487 
2488  // Small enough, and priority high enough, to send for free
2489  if (dPriorityNeeded > 0 && dPriority >= dPriorityNeeded)
2490  break;
2491  }
2492 
2493  CAmount nFeeNeeded = max(nFeePay, GetMinimumFee(nBytes, nTxConfirmTarget, mempool));
2494 
2495  // If we made it here and we aren't even able to meet the relay fee on the next pass, give up
2496  // because we must be at the maximum allowed fee.
2497  if (nFeeNeeded < ::minRelayTxFee.GetFee(nBytes)) {
2498  strFailReason = _("Transaction too large for fee policy");
2499  return false;
2500  }
2501 
2502  if (nFeeRet >= nFeeNeeded) // Done, enough fee included
2503  break;
2504 
2505  // Include more fee and try again.
2506  nFeeRet = nFeeNeeded;
2507  continue;
2508  }
2509  }
2510  }
2511  return true;
2512 }
2513 
2514 bool CWallet::CreateTransaction(CScript scriptPubKey, const CAmount& nValue, CWalletTx& wtxNew, CReserveKey& reservekey, CAmount& nFeeRet, std::string& strFailReason, const CCoinControl* coinControl, AvailableCoinsType coin_type, bool useIX, CAmount nFeePay)
2515 {
2516  vector<pair<CScript, CAmount> > vecSend;
2517  vecSend.push_back(make_pair(scriptPubKey, nValue));
2518  return CreateTransaction(vecSend, wtxNew, reservekey, nFeeRet, strFailReason, coinControl, coin_type, useIX, nFeePay);
2519 }

2521 // ppcoin: create coin stake transaction
2522 bool CWallet::CreateCoinStake(const CKeyStore& keystore, unsigned int nBits, int64_t nSearchInterval, CMutableTransaction& txNew, unsigned int& nTxNewTime)
2523 {
2524  // The following split & combine thresholds are important to security
2525  // Should not be adjusted if you don't understand the consequences
2526  //int64_t nCombineThreshold = 0;
2527 
2528  txNew.vin.clear();
2529  txNew.vout.clear();
2530 
2531  // Mark coin stake transaction
2532  CScript scriptEmpty;
2533  scriptEmpty.clear();
2534  txNew.vout.push_back(CTxOut(0, scriptEmpty));
2535 
2536  // Choose coins to use
2537  CAmount nBalance = GetBalance();
2538 
2539  if (mapArgs.count("-reservebalance") && !ParseMoney(mapArgs["-reservebalance"], nReserveBalance))
2540  return error("CreateCoinStake : invalid reserve balance amount");
2541 
2542  if (nBalance <= nReserveBalance)
2543  return false;
2544 
2545  // presstab HyperStake - Initialize as static and don't update the set on every run of CreateCoinStake() in order to lighten resource use
2546  static std::set<pair<const CWalletTx*, unsigned int> > setStakeCoins;
2547  static int nLastStakeSetUpdate = 0;
2548 
2549  if (GetTime() - nLastStakeSetUpdate > nStakeSetUpdateTime) {
2550  setStakeCoins.clear();
2551  if (!SelectStakeCoins(setStakeCoins, nBalance - nReserveBalance))
2552  return false;
2553 
2554  nLastStakeSetUpdate = GetTime();
2555  }
2556 
2557  if (setStakeCoins.empty())
2558  return false;
2559 
2560  vector<const CWalletTx*> vwtxPrev;
2561 
2562  CAmount nCredit = 0;
2563  CScript scriptPubKeyKernel;
2564 
2565  //prevent staking a time that won't be accepted
2566  if (GetAdjustedTime() <= chainActive.Tip()->nTime)
2567  MilliSleep(10000);
2568 
2569  BOOST_FOREACH (PAIRTYPE(const CWalletTx*, unsigned int) pcoin, setStakeCoins) {
2570  //make sure that enough time has elapsed between
2571  CBlockIndex* pindex = NULL;
2572  BlockMap::iterator it = mapBlockIndex.find(pcoin.first->hashBlock);
2573  if (it != mapBlockIndex.end())
2574  pindex = it->second;
2575  else {
2576  if (fDebug)
2577  LogPrintf("CreateCoinStake() failed to find block index \n");
2578  continue;
2579  }
2580 
2581  // Read block header
2582  CBlockHeader block = pindex->GetBlockHeader();
2583 
2584  bool fKernelFound = false;
2585  uint256 hashProofOfStake = 0;
2586  COutPoint prevoutStake = COutPoint(pcoin.first->GetHash(), pcoin.second);
2587  nTxNewTime = GetAdjustedTime();
2588 
2589  //iterates each utxo inside of CheckStakeKernelHash()
2590  if (CheckStakeKernelHash(nBits, block, *pcoin.first, prevoutStake, nTxNewTime, nHashDrift, false, hashProofOfStake, true)) {
2591  //Double check that this will pass time requirements
2592  if (nTxNewTime <= chainActive.Tip()->GetMedianTimePast()) {
2593  LogPrintf("CreateCoinStake() : kernel found, but it is too far in the past \n");
2594  continue;
2595  }
2596 
2597  // Found a kernel
2598  if (fDebug && GetBoolArg("-printcoinstake", false))
2599  LogPrintf("CreateCoinStake : kernel found\n");
2600 
2601  vector<valtype> vSolutions;
2602  txnouttype whichType;
2603  CScript scriptPubKeyOut;
2604  scriptPubKeyKernel = pcoin.first->vout[pcoin.second].scriptPubKey;
2605  if (!Solver(scriptPubKeyKernel, whichType, vSolutions)) {
2606  LogPrintf("CreateCoinStake : failed to parse kernel\n");
2607  break;
2608  }
2609  if (fDebug && GetBoolArg("-printcoinstake", false))
2610  LogPrintf("CreateCoinStake : parsed kernel type=%d\n", whichType);
2611  if (whichType != TX_PUBKEY && whichType != TX_PUBKEYHASH) {
2612  if (fDebug && GetBoolArg("-printcoinstake", false))
2613  LogPrintf("CreateCoinStake : no support for kernel type=%d\n", whichType);
2614  break; // only support pay to public key and pay to address
2615  }
2616  if (whichType == TX_PUBKEYHASH) // pay to address type
2617  {
2618  //convert to pay to public key type
2619  CKey key;
2620  if (!keystore.GetKey(uint160(vSolutions[0]), key)) {
2621  if (fDebug && GetBoolArg("-printcoinstake", false))
2622  LogPrintf("CreateCoinStake : failed to get key for kernel type=%d\n", whichType);
2623  break; // unable to find corresponding public key
2624  }
2625 
2626  scriptPubKeyOut << key.GetPubKey() << OP_CHECKSIG;
2627  } else
2628  scriptPubKeyOut = scriptPubKeyKernel;
2629 
2630  txNew.vin.push_back(CTxIn(pcoin.first->GetHash(), pcoin.second));
2631  nCredit += pcoin.first->vout[pcoin.second].nValue;
2632  vwtxPrev.push_back(pcoin.first);
2633  txNew.vout.push_back(CTxOut(0, scriptPubKeyOut));
2634 
2635  //presstab HyperStake - calculate the total size of our new output including the stake reward so that we can use it to decide whether to split the stake outputs
2636  const CBlockIndex* pIndex0 = chainActive.Tip();
2637  uint64_t nTotalSize = pcoin.first->vout[pcoin.second].nValue + GetBlockValue(pIndex0->nHeight);
2638 
2639  //presstab HyperStake - if MultiSend is set to send in coinstake we will add our outputs here (values asigned further down)
2640  if (nTotalSize / 2 > nStakeSplitThreshold * COIN)
2641  txNew.vout.push_back(CTxOut(0, scriptPubKeyOut)); //split stake
2642 
2643  if (fDebug && GetBoolArg("-printcoinstake", false))
2644  LogPrintf("CreateCoinStake : added kernel type=%d\n", whichType);
2645  fKernelFound = true;
2646  break;
2647  }
2648  if (fKernelFound)
2649  break; // if kernel is found stop searching
2650  }
2651  if (nCredit == 0 || nCredit > nBalance - nReserveBalance)
2652  return false;
2653 
2654  // Calculate reward
2655  CAmount nReward;
2656  const CBlockIndex* pIndex0 = chainActive.Tip();
2657  nReward = GetBlockValue(pIndex0->nHeight);
2658  nCredit += nReward;
2659 
2660  CAmount nMinFee = 0;
2661  while (true) {
2662  // Set output amount
2663  if (txNew.vout.size() == 3) {
2664  txNew.vout[1].nValue = ((nCredit - nMinFee) / 2 / CENT) * CENT;
2665  txNew.vout[2].nValue = nCredit - nMinFee - txNew.vout[1].nValue;
2666  } else
2667  txNew.vout[1].nValue = nCredit - nMinFee;
2668 
2669  // Limit size
2670  unsigned int nBytes = ::GetSerializeSize(txNew, SER_NETWORK, PROTOCOL_VERSION);
2671  if (nBytes >= DEFAULT_BLOCK_MAX_SIZE / 5)
2672  return error("CreateCoinStake : exceeded coinstake size limit");
2673 
2674  CAmount nFeeNeeded = GetMinimumFee(nBytes, nTxConfirmTarget, mempool);
2675 
2676  // Check enough fee is paid
2677  if (nMinFee < nFeeNeeded) {
2678  nMinFee = nFeeNeeded;
2679  continue; // try signing again
2680  } else {
2681  if (fDebug)
2682  LogPrintf("CreateCoinStake : fee for coinstake %s\n", FormatMoney(nMinFee).c_str());
2683  break;
2684  }
2685  }
2686 
2687  //Masternode payment
2688  FillBlockPayee(txNew, nMinFee, true);
2689 
2690  // Sign
2691  int nIn = 0;
2692  BOOST_FOREACH (const CWalletTx* pcoin, vwtxPrev) {
2693  if (!SignSignature(*this, *pcoin, txNew, nIn++))
2694  return error("CreateCoinStake : failed to sign coinstake");
2695  }
2696 
2697  // Successfully generated coinstake
2698  nLastStakeSetUpdate = 0; //this will trigger stake set to repopulate next round
2699  return true;
2700 }
