2705 bool CWallet::CommitTransaction(CWalletTx& wtxNew, CReserveKey& reservekey, std::string strCommand)
2706 {
2707  {
2708  LOCK2(cs_main, cs_wallet);
2709  LogPrintf("CommitTransaction:\n%s", wtxNew.ToString());
2710  {
2711  // This is only to keep the database open to defeat the auto-flush for the
2712  // duration of this scope. This is the only place where this optimization
2713  // maybe makes sense; please don't do it anywhere else.
2714  CWalletDB* pwalletdb = fFileBacked ? new CWalletDB(strWalletFile, "r") : NULL;
2715 
2716  // Take key pair from key pool so it won't be used again
2717  reservekey.KeepKey();
2718 
2719  // Add tx to wallet, because if it has change it's also ours,
2720  // otherwise just for transaction history.
2721  AddToWallet(wtxNew);
2722 
2723  // Notify that old coins are spent
2724  if (!wtxNew.IsZerocoinSpend()) {
2725  set<uint256> updated_hahes;
2726  BOOST_FOREACH (const CTxIn& txin, wtxNew.vin) {
2727  // notify only once
2728  if (updated_hahes.find(txin.prevout.hash) != updated_hahes.end()) continue;
2729 
2730  CWalletTx& coin = mapWallet[txin.prevout.hash];
2731  coin.BindWallet(this);
2732  NotifyTransactionChanged(this, txin.prevout.hash, CT_UPDATED);
2733  updated_hahes.insert(txin.prevout.hash);
2734  }
2735  }
2736 
2737  if (fFileBacked)
2738  delete pwalletdb;
2739  }
2740 
2741  // Track how many getdata requests our transaction gets
2742  mapRequestCount[wtxNew.GetHash()] = 0;
2743 
2744  // Broadcast
2745  if (!wtxNew.AcceptToMemoryPool(false)) {
2746  // This must not fail. The transaction has already been signed and recorded.
2747  LogPrintf("CommitTransaction() : Error: Transaction not valid\n");
2748  return false;
2749  }
2750  wtxNew.RelayWalletTransaction(strCommand);
2751  }
2752  return true;
2753 }
2754 
2755 CAmount CWallet::GetMinimumFee(unsigned int nTxBytes, unsigned int nConfirmTarget, const CTxMemPool& pool)
2756 {
2757  // payTxFee is user-set "I want to pay this much"
2758  CAmount nFeeNeeded = payTxFee.GetFee(nTxBytes);
2759  // user selected total at least (default=true)
2760  if (fPayAtLeastCustomFee && nFeeNeeded > 0 && nFeeNeeded < payTxFee.GetFeePerK())
2761  nFeeNeeded = payTxFee.GetFeePerK();
2762  // User didn't set: use -txconfirmtarget to estimate...
2763  if (nFeeNeeded == 0)
2764  nFeeNeeded = pool.estimateFee(nConfirmTarget).GetFee(nTxBytes);
2765  // ... unless we don't have enough mempool data, in which case fall
2766  // back to a hard-coded fee
2767  if (nFeeNeeded == 0)
2768  nFeeNeeded = minTxFee.GetFee(nTxBytes);
2769  // prevent user from paying a non-sense fee (like 1 satoshi): 0 < fee < minRelayFee
2770  if (nFeeNeeded < ::minRelayTxFee.GetFee(nTxBytes))
2771  nFeeNeeded = ::minRelayTxFee.GetFee(nTxBytes);
2772  // But always obey the maximum
2773  if (nFeeNeeded > maxTxFee)
2774  nFeeNeeded = maxTxFee;
2775  return nFeeNeeded;
2776 }
2777 
2778 CAmount CWallet::GetTotalValue(std::vector<CTxIn> vCoins)
2779 {
2780  CAmount nTotalValue = 0;
2781  CWalletTx wtx;
2782  BOOST_FOREACH (CTxIn i, vCoins) {
2783  if (mapWallet.count(i.prevout.hash)) {
2784  CWalletTx& wtx = mapWallet[i.prevout.hash];
2785  if (i.prevout.n < wtx.vout.size()) {
2786  nTotalValue += wtx.vout[i.prevout.n].nValue;
2787  }
2788  } else {
2789  LogPrintf("GetTotalValue -- Couldn't find transaction\n");
2790  }
2791  }
2792  return nTotalValue;
2793 }
2794 
2795 string CWallet::PrepareObfuscationDenominate(int minRounds, int maxRounds)
2796 {
2797  if (IsLocked())
2798  return _("Error: Wallet locked, unable to create transaction!");
2799 
2800  if (obfuScationPool.GetState() != POOL_STATUS_ERROR && obfuScationPool.GetState() != POOL_STATUS_SUCCESS)
2801  if (obfuScationPool.GetEntriesCount() > 0)
2802  return _("Error: You already have pending entries in the Obfuscation pool");
2803 
2804  // ** find the coins we'll use
2805  std::vector<CTxIn> vCoins;
2806  std::vector<CTxIn> vCoinsResult;
2807  std::vector<COutput> vCoins2;
2808  CAmount nValueIn = 0;
2809  CReserveKey reservekey(this);
2810 
2811  /*
2812  Select the coins we'll use
2813 
2814  if minRounds >= 0 it means only denominated inputs are going in and coming out
2815  */
2816  if (minRounds >= 0) {
2817  if (!SelectCoinsByDenominations(obfuScationPool.sessionDenom, 0.1 * COIN, OBFUSCATION_POOL_MAX, vCoins, vCoins2, nValueIn, minRounds, maxRounds))
2818  return _("Error: Can't select current denominated inputs");
2819  }
2820 
2821  LogPrintf("PrepareObfuscationDenominate - preparing obfuscation denominate . Got: %d \n", nValueIn);
2822 
2823  {
2824  LOCK(cs_wallet);
2825  BOOST_FOREACH (CTxIn v, vCoins)
2826  LockCoin(v.prevout);
2827  }
2828 
2829  CAmount nValueLeft = nValueIn;
2830  std::vector<CTxOut> vOut;
2831 
2832  /*
2833  TODO: Front load with needed denominations (e.g. .1, 1 )
2834  */
2835 
2836  // Make outputs by looping through denominations: try to add every needed denomination, repeat up to 5-10 times.
2837  // This way we can be pretty sure that it should have at least one of each needed denomination.
2838  // NOTE: No need to randomize order of inputs because they were
2839  // initially shuffled in CWallet::SelectCoinsByDenominations already.
2840  int nStep = 0;
2841  int nStepsMax = 5 + GetRandInt(5);
2842  while (nStep < nStepsMax) {
2843  BOOST_FOREACH (CAmount v, obfuScationDenominations) {
2844  // only use the ones that are approved
2845  bool fAccepted = false;
2846  if ((obfuScationPool.sessionDenom & (1 << 0)) && v == ((10000 * COIN) + 10000000)) {
2847  fAccepted = true;
2848  } else if ((obfuScationPool.sessionDenom & (1 << 1)) && v == ((1000 * COIN) + 1000000)) {
2849  fAccepted = true;
2850  } else if ((obfuScationPool.sessionDenom & (1 << 2)) && v == ((100 * COIN) + 100000)) {
2851  fAccepted = true;
2852  } else if ((obfuScationPool.sessionDenom & (1 << 3)) && v == ((10 * COIN) + 10000)) {
2853  fAccepted = true;
2854  } else if ((obfuScationPool.sessionDenom & (1 << 4)) && v == ((1 * COIN) + 1000)) {
2855  fAccepted = true;
2856  } else if ((obfuScationPool.sessionDenom & (1 << 5)) && v == ((.1 * COIN) + 100)) {
2857  fAccepted = true;
2858  }
2859  if (!fAccepted) continue;
2860 
2861  // try to add it
2862  if (nValueLeft - v >= 0) {
2863  // Note: this relies on a fact that both vectors MUST have same size
2864  std::vector<CTxIn>::iterator it = vCoins.begin();
2865  std::vector<COutput>::iterator it2 = vCoins2.begin();
2866  while (it2 != vCoins2.end()) {
2867  // we have matching inputs
2868  if ((*it2).tx->vout[(*it2).i].nValue == v) {
2869  // add new input in resulting vector
2870  vCoinsResult.push_back(*it);
2871  // remove corresponting items from initial vectors
2872  vCoins.erase(it);
2873  vCoins2.erase(it2);
2874 
2875  CScript scriptChange;
2876  CPubKey vchPubKey;
2877  // use a unique change address
2878  assert(reservekey.GetReservedKey(vchPubKey)); // should never fail, as we just unlocked
2879  scriptChange = GetScriptForDestination(vchPubKey.GetID());
2880  reservekey.KeepKey();
2881 
2882  // add new output
2883  CTxOut o(v, scriptChange);
2884  vOut.push_back(o);
2885 
2886  // subtract denomination amount
2887  nValueLeft -= v;
2888 
2889  break;
2890  }
2891  ++it;
2892  ++it2;
2893  }
2894  }
2895  }
2896 
2897  nStep++;
2898 
2899  if (nValueLeft == 0) break;
2900  }
2901 
2902  {
2903  // unlock unused coins
2904  LOCK(cs_wallet);
2905  BOOST_FOREACH (CTxIn v, vCoins)
2906  UnlockCoin(v.prevout);
2907  }
2908 
2909  if (obfuScationPool.GetDenominations(vOut) != obfuScationPool.sessionDenom) {
2910  // unlock used coins on failure
2911  LOCK(cs_wallet);
2912  BOOST_FOREACH (CTxIn v, vCoinsResult)
2913  UnlockCoin(v.prevout);
2914  return "Error: can't make current denominated outputs";
2915  }
2916 
2917  // randomize the output order
2918  std::random_shuffle(vOut.begin(), vOut.end());
2919 
2920  // We also do not care about full amount as long as we have right denominations, just pass what we found
2921  obfuScationPool.SendObfuscationDenominate(vCoinsResult, vOut, nValueIn - nValueLeft);
2922 
2923  return "";
2924 }

3054 bool CWallet::TopUpKeyPool(unsigned int kpSize)
3055 {
3056  {
3057  LOCK(cs_wallet);
3058 
3059  if (IsLocked())
3060  return false;
3061 
3062  CWalletDB walletdb(strWalletFile);
3063 
3064  // Top up key pool
3065  unsigned int nTargetSize;
3066  if (kpSize > 0)
3067  nTargetSize = kpSize;
3068  else
3069  nTargetSize = max(GetArg("-keypool", 1000), (int64_t)0);
3070 
3071  while (setKeyPool.size() < (nTargetSize + 1)) {
3072  int64_t nEnd = 1;
3073  if (!setKeyPool.empty())
3074  nEnd = *(--setKeyPool.end()) + 1;
3075  if (!walletdb.WritePool(nEnd, CKeyPool(GenerateNewKey())))
3076  throw runtime_error("TopUpKeyPool() : writing generated key failed");
3077  setKeyPool.insert(nEnd);
3078  LogPrintf("keypool added key %d, size=%u\n", nEnd, setKeyPool.size());
3079  double dProgress = 100.f * nEnd / (nTargetSize + 1);
3080  std::string strMsg = strprintf(_("Loading wallet... (%3.2f %%)"), dProgress);
3081  uiInterface.InitMessage(strMsg);
3082  }
3083  }
3084  return true;
3085 }

3087 void CWallet::ReserveKeyFromKeyPool(int64_t& nIndex, CKeyPool& keypool)
3088 {

3092  LOCK(cs_wallet);
3093

3095  TopUpKeyPool();
3096 
3097  // Get the oldest key
3098  if (setKeyPool.empty())
3099  return;
3100 
3101  CWalletDB walletdb(strWalletFile);
3102 
3103  nIndex = *(setKeyPool.begin());
3104  setKeyPool.erase(setKeyPool.begin());
3105  if (!walletdb.ReadPool(nIndex, keypool))
3106  throw runtime_error("ReserveKeyFromKeyPool() : read failed");
3107  if (!HaveKey(keypool.vchPubKey.GetID()))
3108  throw runtime_error("ReserveKeyFromKeyPool() : unknown key in key pool");
3109  assert(keypool.vchPubKey.IsValid());
3110  LogPrintf("keypool reserve %d\n", nIndex);
3111  }
3112 }

3163 std::map<CTxDestination, CAmount> CWallet::GetAddressBalances()
3164 {
3165  map<CTxDestination, CAmount> balances;
3166 
3167  {
3168  LOCK(cs_wallet);
3169  BOOST_FOREACH (PAIRTYPE(uint256, CWalletTx) walletEntry, mapWallet) {
3170  CWalletTx* pcoin = &walletEntry.second;
3171 
3172  if (!IsFinalTx(*pcoin) || !pcoin->IsTrusted())
3173  continue;
3174 
3175  if (pcoin->IsCoinBase() && pcoin->GetBlocksToMaturity() > 0)
3176  continue;
3177 
3178  int nDepth = pcoin->GetDepthInMainChain();
3179  if (nDepth < (pcoin->IsFromMe(ISMINE_ALL) ? 0 : 1))
3180  continue;
3181 
3182  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < pcoin->vout.size(); i++) {
3183  CTxDestination addr;
3184  if (!IsMine(pcoin->vout[i]))
3185  continue;
3186  if (!ExtractDestination(pcoin->vout[i].scriptPubKey, addr))
3187  continue;
3188 
3189  CAmount n = IsSpent(walletEntry.first, i) ? 0 : pcoin->vout[i].nValue;
3190 
3191  if (!balances.count(addr))
3192  balances[addr] = 0;
3193  balances[addr] += n;
3194  }
3195  }
3196  }
3197 
3198  return balances;
3199 }

3201 set<set<CTxDestination> > CWallet::GetAddressGroupings()
3202 {
3203  AssertLockHeld(cs_wallet); // mapWallet
3204  set<set<CTxDestination> > groupings;
3205  set<CTxDestination> grouping;
3206 
3207  BOOST_FOREACH (PAIRTYPE(uint256, CWalletTx) walletEntry, mapWallet) {
3208  CWalletTx* pcoin = &walletEntry.second;
3209 
3210  if (pcoin->vin.size() > 0) {
3211  bool any_mine = false;
3212  // group all input addresses with each other
3213  BOOST_FOREACH (CTxIn txin, pcoin->vin) {
3214  CTxDestination address;
3215  if (!IsMine(txin)) /* If this input isn't mine, ignore it */
3216  continue;
3217  if (!ExtractDestination(mapWallet[txin.prevout.hash].vout[txin.prevout.n].scriptPubKey, address))
3218  continue;
3219  grouping.insert(address);
3220  any_mine = true;
3221  }
3222 
3223  // group change with input addresses
3224  if (any_mine) {
3225  BOOST_FOREACH (CTxOut txout, pcoin->vout)
3226  if (IsChange(txout)) {
3227  CTxDestination txoutAddr;
3228  if (!ExtractDestination(txout.scriptPubKey, txoutAddr))
3229  continue;
3230  grouping.insert(txoutAddr);
3231  }
3232  }
3233  if (grouping.size() > 0) {
3234  groupings.insert(grouping);
3235  grouping.clear();
3236  }
3237  }
3238 
3239  // group lone addrs by themselves
3240  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < pcoin->vout.size(); i++)
3241  if (IsMine(pcoin->vout[i])) {
3242  CTxDestination address;
3243  if (!ExtractDestination(pcoin->vout[i].scriptPubKey, address))
3244  continue;
3245  grouping.insert(address);
3246  groupings.insert(grouping);
3247  grouping.clear();
3248  }
3249  }
3250 
3251  set<set<CTxDestination>*> uniqueGroupings; // a set of pointers to groups of addresses
3252  map<CTxDestination, set<CTxDestination>*> setmap; // map addresses to the unique group containing it
3253  BOOST_FOREACH (set<CTxDestination> grouping, groupings) {
3254  // make a set of all the groups hit by this new group
3255  set<set<CTxDestination>*> hits;
3256  map<CTxDestination, set<CTxDestination>*>::iterator it;
3257  BOOST_FOREACH (CTxDestination address, grouping)
3258  if ((it = setmap.find(address)) != setmap.end())
3259  hits.insert((*it).second);
3260 
3261  // merge all hit groups into a new single group and delete old groups
3262  set<CTxDestination>* merged = new set<CTxDestination>(grouping);
3263  BOOST_FOREACH (set<CTxDestination>* hit, hits) {
3264  merged->insert(hit->begin(), hit->end());
3265  uniqueGroupings.erase(hit);
3266  delete hit;
3267  }
3268  uniqueGroupings.insert(merged);
3269 
3270  // update setmap
3271  BOOST_FOREACH (CTxDestination element, *merged)
3272  setmap[element] = merged;
3273  }
3274 
3275  set<set<CTxDestination> > ret;
3276  BOOST_FOREACH (set<CTxDestination>* uniqueGrouping, uniqueGroupings) {
3277  ret.insert(*uniqueGrouping);
3278  delete uniqueGrouping;
3279  }
3280 
3281  return ret;
3282 }

3400 class CAffectedKeysVisitor : public boost::static_visitor<void>
3401 {
3402 private:
3403  const CKeyStore& keystore;
3404  std::vector<CKeyID>& vKeys;
3405 
3406 public:
3407  CAffectedKeysVisitor(const CKeyStore& keystoreIn, std::vector<CKeyID>& vKeysIn) : keystore(keystoreIn), vKeys(vKeysIn) {}
3408 
3409  void Process(const CScript& script)
3410  {
3411  txnouttype type;
3412  std::vector<CTxDestination> vDest;
3413  int nRequired;
3414  if (ExtractDestinations(script, type, vDest, nRequired)) {
3415  BOOST_FOREACH (const CTxDestination& dest, vDest)
3416  boost::apply_visitor(*this, dest);
3417  }
3418  }
3419 
3420  void operator()(const CKeyID& keyId)
3421  {
3422  if (keystore.HaveKey(keyId))
3423  vKeys.push_back(keyId);
3424  }
3425 
3426  void operator()(const CScriptID& scriptId)
3427  {
3428  CScript script;
3429  if (keystore.GetCScript(scriptId, script))
3430  Process(script);
3431  }
3432 
3433  void operator()(const CNoDestination& none) {}
3434 };
3435 
3436 void CWallet::GetKeyBirthTimes(std::map<CKeyID, int64_t>& mapKeyBirth) const
3437 {
3438  AssertLockHeld(cs_wallet); // mapKeyMetadata
3439  mapKeyBirth.clear();
3440 
3441  // get birth times for keys with metadata
3442  for (std::map<CKeyID, CKeyMetadata>::const_iterator it = mapKeyMetadata.begin(); it != mapKeyMetadata.end(); it++)
3443  if (it->second.nCreateTime)
3444  mapKeyBirth[it->first] = it->second.nCreateTime;
3445 
3446  // map in which we'll infer heights of other keys
3447  CBlockIndex* pindexMax = chainActive[std::max(0, chainActive.Height() - 144)]; // the tip can be reorganised; use a 144-block safety margin
3448  std::map<CKeyID, CBlockIndex*> mapKeyFirstBlock;
3449  std::set<CKeyID> setKeys;
3450  GetKeys(setKeys);
3451  BOOST_FOREACH (const CKeyID& keyid, setKeys) {
3452  if (mapKeyBirth.count(keyid) == 0)
3453  mapKeyFirstBlock[keyid] = pindexMax;
3454  }
3455  setKeys.clear();
3456 
3457  // if there are no such keys, we're done
3458  if (mapKeyFirstBlock.empty())
3459  return;
3460 
3461  // find first block that affects those keys, if there are any left
3462  std::vector<CKeyID> vAffected;
3463  for (std::map<uint256, CWalletTx>::const_iterator it = mapWallet.begin(); it != mapWallet.end(); it++) {
3464  // iterate over all wallet transactions...
3465  const CWalletTx& wtx = (*it).second;
3466  BlockMap::const_iterator blit = mapBlockIndex.find(wtx.hashBlock);
3467  if (blit != mapBlockIndex.end() && chainActive.Contains(blit->second)) {
3468  // ... which are already in a block
3469  int nHeight = blit->second->nHeight;
3470  BOOST_FOREACH (const CTxOut& txout, wtx.vout) {
3471  // iterate over all their outputs
3472  CAffectedKeysVisitor(*this, vAffected).Process(txout.scriptPubKey);
3473  BOOST_FOREACH (const CKeyID& keyid, vAffected) {
3474  // ... and all their affected keys
3475  std::map<CKeyID, CBlockIndex*>::iterator rit = mapKeyFirstBlock.find(keyid);
3476  if (rit != mapKeyFirstBlock.end() && nHeight < rit->second->nHeight)
3477  rit->second = blit->second;
3478  }
3479  vAffected.clear();
3480  }
3481  }
3482  }
3483 
3484  // Extract block timestamps for those keys
3485  for (std::map<CKeyID, CBlockIndex*>::const_iterator it = mapKeyFirstBlock.begin(); it != mapKeyFirstBlock.end(); it++)
3486  mapKeyBirth[it->first] = it->second->GetBlockTime() - 7200; // block times can be 2h off
3487 }

3515 bool CWallet::GetDestData(const CTxDestination& dest, const std::string& key, std::string* value) const
3516 {

3518  if (i != mapAddressBook.end()) {
3519  CAddressBookData::StringMap::const_iterator j = i->second.destdata.find(key);

3523  return true;
3524  }
3525  }
3526  return false;
3527 }
3528 
3529 // CWallet::AutoZeromint() gets called with each new incoming block
3530 void CWallet::AutoZeromint()
3531 {
3532  // Don't bother Autominting if Zerocoin Protocol isn't active
3533  if (GetAdjustedTime() > GetSporkValue(SPORK_16_ZEROCOIN_MAINTENANCE_MODE)) return;
3534 
3535  // Wait until blockchain + masternodes are fully synced and wallet is unlocked.
3536  if (!masternodeSync.IsSynced() || IsLocked()){
3537  // Re-adjust startup time in case syncing needs a long time.
3538  nStartupTime = GetAdjustedTime();
3539  return;
3540  }
3541 
3542  // After sync wait even more to reduce load when wallet was just started
3543  int64_t nWaitTime = GetAdjustedTime() - nStartupTime;
3544  if (nWaitTime < AUTOMINT_DELAY){
3545  LogPrint("zero", "CWallet::AutoZeromint(): time since sync-completion or last Automint (%ld sec) < default waiting time (%ld sec). Waiting again...\n", nWaitTime, AUTOMINT_DELAY);
3546  return;
3547  }
3548 
3549  CAmount nZerocoinBalance = GetZerocoinBalance(false); //false includes both pending and mature zerocoins. Need total balance for this so nothing is overminted.
3550  CAmount nBalance = GetUnlockedCoins(); // We only consider unlocked coins, this also excludes masternode-vins
3551  // from being accidentally minted
3552  CAmount nMintAmount = 0;
3553  CAmount nToMintAmount = 0;
3554 
3555  // zDIV are integers > 0, so we can't mint 10% of 9 DIV
3556  if (nBalance < 10){
3557  LogPrint("zero", "CWallet::AutoZeromint(): available balance (%ld) too small for minting zDIV\n", nBalance);
3558  return;
3559  }
3560 
3561  // Percentage of zDIV we already have
3562  double dPercentage = 100 * (double)nZerocoinBalance / (double)(nZerocoinBalance + nBalance);
3563 
3564  // Check if minting is actually needed
3565  if(dPercentage >= nZeromintPercentage){
3566  LogPrint("zero", "CWallet::AutoZeromint() @block %ld: percentage of existing zDIV (%lf%%) already >= configured percentage (%d%%). No minting needed...\n",
3567  chainActive.Tip()->nHeight, dPercentage, nZeromintPercentage);
3568  return;
3569  }
3570 
3571  // zDIV amount needed for the target percentage
3572  nToMintAmount = ((nZerocoinBalance + nBalance) * nZeromintPercentage / 100);
3573 
3574  // zDIV amount missing from target (must be minted)
3575  nToMintAmount = (nToMintAmount - nZerocoinBalance) / COIN;
3576 
3577  // Use the biggest denomination smaller than the needed zDIV We'll only mint exact denomination to make minting faster.
3578  // Exception: for big amounts use 6666 (6666 = 1*5000 + 1*1000 + 1*500 + 1*100 + 1*50 + 1*10 + 1*5 + 1) to create all
3579  // possible denominations to avoid having 5000 denominations only.
3580  // If a preferred denomination is used (means nPreferredDenom != 0) do nothing until we have enough DIV to mint this denomination
3581 
3582  if (nPreferredDenom > 0){
3583  if (nToMintAmount >= nPreferredDenom)
3584  nToMintAmount = nPreferredDenom; // Enough coins => mint preferred denomination
3585  else
3586  nToMintAmount = 0; // Not enough coins => do nothing and wait for more coins
3587  }
3588 
3589  if (nToMintAmount >= ZQ_6666){
3590  nMintAmount = ZQ_6666;
3591  } else if (nToMintAmount >= libzerocoin::CoinDenomination::ZQ_FIVE_THOUSAND){
3592  nMintAmount = libzerocoin::CoinDenomination::ZQ_FIVE_THOUSAND;
3593  } else if (nToMintAmount >= libzerocoin::CoinDenomination::ZQ_ONE_THOUSAND){
3594  nMintAmount = libzerocoin::CoinDenomination::ZQ_ONE_THOUSAND;
3595  } else if (nToMintAmount >= libzerocoin::CoinDenomination::ZQ_FIVE_HUNDRED){
3596  nMintAmount = libzerocoin::CoinDenomination::ZQ_FIVE_HUNDRED;
3597  } else if (nToMintAmount >= libzerocoin::CoinDenomination::ZQ_ONE_HUNDRED){
3598  nMintAmount = libzerocoin::CoinDenomination::ZQ_ONE_HUNDRED;
3599  } else if (nToMintAmount >= libzerocoin::CoinDenomination::ZQ_FIFTY){
3600  nMintAmount = libzerocoin::CoinDenomination::ZQ_FIFTY;
3601  } else if (nToMintAmount >= libzerocoin::CoinDenomination::ZQ_TEN){
3602  nMintAmount = libzerocoin::CoinDenomination::ZQ_TEN;
3603  } else if (nToMintAmount >= libzerocoin::CoinDenomination::ZQ_FIVE){
3604  nMintAmount = libzerocoin::CoinDenomination::ZQ_FIVE;
3605  } else if (nToMintAmount >= libzerocoin::CoinDenomination::ZQ_ONE){
3606  nMintAmount = libzerocoin::CoinDenomination::ZQ_ONE;
3607  } else {
3608  nMintAmount = 0;
3609  }
3610 
3611  if (nMintAmount > 0){
3612  CWalletTx wtx;
3613  vector<CZerocoinMint> vMints;
3614  string strError = pwalletMain->MintZerocoin(nMintAmount*COIN, wtx, vMints);
3615 
3616  // Return if something went wrong during minting
3617  if (strError != ""){
3618  LogPrintf("CWallet::AutoZeromint(): auto minting failed with error: %s\n", strError);
3619  return;
3620  }
3621  nZerocoinBalance = GetZerocoinBalance(false);
3622  nBalance = GetUnlockedCoins();
3623  dPercentage = 100 * (double)nZerocoinBalance / (double)(nZerocoinBalance + nBalance);
3624  LogPrintf("CWallet::AutoZeromint() @ block %ld: successfully minted %ld zDIV. Current percentage of zDIV: %lf%%\n",
3625  chainActive.Tip()->nHeight, nMintAmount, dPercentage);
3626  // Re-adjust startup time to delay next Automint for 5 minutes
3627  nStartupTime = GetAdjustedTime();
3628  }
3629  else {
3630  LogPrintf("CWallet::AutoZeromint(): Nothing minted because either not enough funds available or the requested denomination size (%d) is not yet reached.\n", nPreferredDenom);
3631  }
3632 }
3633 
3634 void CWallet::AutoCombineDust()
3635 {
3636  if (IsInitialBlockDownload() || IsLocked()) {
3637  return;
3638  }
3639 
3640  map<CBitcoinAddress, vector<COutput> > mapCoinsByAddress = AvailableCoinsByAddress(true, 0);
3641 
3642  //coins are sectioned by address. This combination code only wants to combine inputs that belong to the same address
3643  for (map<CBitcoinAddress, vector<COutput> >::iterator it = mapCoinsByAddress.begin(); it != mapCoinsByAddress.end(); it++) {
3644  vector<COutput> vCoins, vRewardCoins;
3645  vCoins = it->second;
3646 
3647  //find masternode rewards that need to be combined
3648  CCoinControl* coinControl = new CCoinControl();
3649  CAmount nTotalRewardsValue = 0;
3650  BOOST_FOREACH (const COutput& out, vCoins) {
3651  //no coins should get this far if they dont have proper maturity, this is double checking
3652  if (out.tx->IsCoinStake() && out.tx->GetDepthInMainChain() < COINBASE_MATURITY + 1)
3653  continue;
3654 
3655  if (out.Value() > nAutoCombineThreshold * COIN)
3656  continue;
3657 
3658  COutPoint outpt(out.tx->GetHash(), out.i);
3659  coinControl->Select(outpt);
3660  vRewardCoins.push_back(out);
3661  nTotalRewardsValue += out.Value();
3662  }
3663 
3664  //if no inputs found then return
3665  if (!coinControl->HasSelected())
3666  continue;
3667 
3668  //we cannot combine one coin with itself
3669  if (vRewardCoins.size() <= 1)
3670  continue;
3671 
3672  vector<pair<CScript, CAmount> > vecSend;
3673  CScript scriptPubKey = GetScriptForDestination(it->first.Get());
3674  vecSend.push_back(make_pair(scriptPubKey, nTotalRewardsValue));
3675 
3676  // Create the transaction and commit it to the network
3677  CWalletTx wtx;
3678  CReserveKey keyChange(this); // this change address does not end up being used, because change is returned with coin control switch
3679  string strErr;
3680  CAmount nFeeRet = 0;
3681 
3682  //get the fee amount
3683  CWalletTx wtxdummy;
3684  CreateTransaction(vecSend, wtxdummy, keyChange, nFeeRet, strErr, coinControl, ALL_COINS, false, CAmount(0));
3685  vecSend[0].second = nTotalRewardsValue - nFeeRet - 500;
3686 
3687  if (!CreateTransaction(vecSend, wtx, keyChange, nFeeRet, strErr, coinControl, ALL_COINS, false, CAmount(0))) {
3688  LogPrintf("AutoCombineDust createtransaction failed, reason: %s\n", strErr);
3689  continue;
3690  }
3691 
3692  if (!CommitTransaction(wtx, keyChange)) {
3693  LogPrintf("AutoCombineDust transaction commit failed\n");
3694  continue;
3695  }
3696 
3697  LogPrintf("AutoCombineDust sent transaction\n");
3698 
3699  delete coinControl;
3700  }
3701 }

3703 bool CWallet::MultiSend()
3704 {
3705  if (IsInitialBlockDownload() || IsLocked()) {
3706  return false;
3707  }
3708 
3709  if (chainActive.Tip()->nHeight <= nLastMultiSendHeight) {
3710  LogPrintf("Multisend: lastmultisendheight is higher than current best height\n");
3711  return false;
3712  }
3713 
3714  std::vector<COutput> vCoins;
3715  AvailableCoins(vCoins);
3716  int stakeSent = 0;
3717  int mnSent = 0;
3718  BOOST_FOREACH (const COutput& out, vCoins) {
3719  //need output with precise confirm count - this is how we identify which is the output to send
3720  if (out.tx->GetDepthInMainChain() != COINBASE_MATURITY + 1)
3721  continue;
3722 
3723  COutPoint outpoint(out.tx->GetHash(), out.i);
3724  bool sendMSonMNReward = fMultiSendMasternodeReward && outpoint.IsMasternodeReward(out.tx);
3725  bool sendMSOnStake = fMultiSendStake && out.tx->IsCoinStake() && !sendMSonMNReward; //output is either mnreward or stake reward, not both
3726 
3727  if (!(sendMSOnStake || sendMSonMNReward))
3728  continue;
3729 
3730  CTxDestination destMyAddress;
3731  if (!ExtractDestination(out.tx->vout[out.i].scriptPubKey, destMyAddress)) {
3732  LogPrintf("Multisend: failed to extract destination\n");
3733  continue;
3734  }
3735 
3736  //Disabled Addresses won't send MultiSend transactions
3737  if (vDisabledAddresses.size() > 0) {
3738  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < vDisabledAddresses.size(); i++) {
3739  if (vDisabledAddresses[i] == CBitcoinAddress(destMyAddress).ToString()) {
3740  LogPrintf("Multisend: disabled address preventing multisend\n");
3741  return false;
3742  }
3743  }
3744  }
3745 
3746  // create new coin control, populate it with the selected utxo, create sending vector
3747  CCoinControl* cControl = new CCoinControl();
3748  COutPoint outpt(out.tx->GetHash(), out.i);
3749  cControl->Select(outpt);
3750  cControl->destChange = destMyAddress;
3751 
3752  CWalletTx wtx;
3753  CReserveKey keyChange(this); // this change address does not end up being used, because change is returned with coin control switch
3754  CAmount nFeeRet = 0;
3755  vector<pair<CScript, CAmount> > vecSend;
3756 
3757  // loop through multisend vector and add amounts and addresses to the sending vector
3758  const isminefilter filter = ISMINE_SPENDABLE;
3759  CAmount nAmount = 0;
3760  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < vMultiSend.size(); i++) {
3761  // MultiSend vector is a pair of 1)Address as a std::string 2) Percent of stake to send as an int
3762  nAmount = ((out.tx->GetCredit(filter) - out.tx->GetDebit(filter)) * vMultiSend[i].second) / 100;
3763  CBitcoinAddress strAddSend(vMultiSend[i].first);
3764  CScript scriptPubKey;
3765  scriptPubKey = GetScriptForDestination(strAddSend.Get());
3766  vecSend.push_back(make_pair(scriptPubKey, nAmount));
3767  }
3768 
3769  //get the fee amount
3770  CWalletTx wtxdummy;
3771  string strErr;
3772  CreateTransaction(vecSend, wtxdummy, keyChange, nFeeRet, strErr, cControl, ALL_COINS, false, CAmount(0));
3773  CAmount nLastSendAmount = vecSend[vecSend.size() - 1].second;
3774  if (nLastSendAmount < nFeeRet + 500) {
3775  LogPrintf("%s: fee of %d is too large to insert into last output\n", __func__, nFeeRet + 500);
3776  return false;
3777  }
3778  vecSend[vecSend.size() - 1].second = nLastSendAmount - nFeeRet - 500;
3779 
3780  // Create the transaction and commit it to the network
3781  if (!CreateTransaction(vecSend, wtx, keyChange, nFeeRet, strErr, cControl, ALL_COINS, false, CAmount(0))) {
3782  LogPrintf("MultiSend createtransaction failed\n");
3783  return false;
3784  }
3785 
3786  if (!CommitTransaction(wtx, keyChange)) {
3787  LogPrintf("MultiSend transaction commit failed\n");
3788  return false;
3789  } else
3790  fMultiSendNotify = true;
3791 
3792  delete cControl;
3793 
3794  //write nLastMultiSendHeight to DB
3795  CWalletDB walletdb(strWalletFile);
3796  nLastMultiSendHeight = chainActive.Tip()->nHeight;
3797  if (!walletdb.WriteMSettings(fMultiSendStake, fMultiSendMasternodeReward, nLastMultiSendHeight))
3798  LogPrintf("Failed to write MultiSend setting to DB\n");
3799 
3800  LogPrintf("MultiSend successfully sent\n");
3801  if (sendMSOnStake)
3802  stakeSent++;
3803  else
3804  mnSent++;
3805 
3806  //stop iterating if we are done
3807  if (mnSent > 0 && stakeSent > 0)
3808  return true;
3809  if (stakeSent > 0 && !fMultiSendMasternodeReward)
3810  return true;
3811  if (mnSent > 0 && !fMultiSendStake)
3812  return true;
3813  }
3814 
3815  return true;
3816 }

3835 int CMerkleTx::SetMerkleBranch(const CBlock& block)
3836 {
3837  AssertLockHeld(cs_main);
3838  CBlock blockTmp;
3839 
3840  // Update the tx's hashBlock
3841  hashBlock = block.GetHash();
3842 
3843  // Locate the transaction
3844  for (nIndex = 0; nIndex < (int)block.vtx.size(); nIndex++)
3845  if (block.vtx[nIndex] == *(CTransaction*)this)
3846  break;
3847  if (nIndex == (int)block.vtx.size()) {
3848  vMerkleBranch.clear();
3849  nIndex = -1;
3850  LogPrintf("ERROR: SetMerkleBranch() : couldn't find tx in block\n");
3851  return 0;
3852  }
3853 
3854  // Fill in merkle branch
3855  vMerkleBranch = block.GetMerkleBranch(nIndex);
3856 
3857  // Is the tx in a block that's in the main chain
3858  BlockMap::iterator mi = mapBlockIndex.find(hashBlock);
3859  if (mi == mapBlockIndex.end())
3860  return 0;
3861  const CBlockIndex* pindex = (*mi).second;
3862  if (!pindex || !chainActive.Contains(pindex))
3863  return 0;
3864 
3865  return chainActive.Height() - pindex->nHeight + 1;
3866 }
3867 
3868 int CMerkleTx::GetDepthInMainChainINTERNAL(const CBlockIndex*& pindexRet) const
3869 {
3870  if (hashBlock == 0 || nIndex == -1)
3871  return 0;
3872  AssertLockHeld(cs_main);
3873 
3874  // Find the block it claims to be in
3875  BlockMap::iterator mi = mapBlockIndex.find(hashBlock);
3876  if (mi == mapBlockIndex.end())
3877  return 0;
3878  CBlockIndex* pindex = (*mi).second;
3879  if (!pindex || !chainActive.Contains(pindex))
3880  return 0;
3881 
3882  // Make sure the merkle branch connects to this block
3883  if (!fMerkleVerified) {
3884  if (CBlock::CheckMerkleBranch(GetHash(), vMerkleBranch, nIndex) != pindex->hashMerkleRoot)
3885  return 0;
3886  fMerkleVerified = true;
3887  }
3888 
3889  pindexRet = pindex;
3890  return chainActive.Height() - pindex->nHeight + 1;
3891 }

3893 int CMerkleTx::GetDepthInMainChain(const CBlockIndex*& pindexRet, bool enableIX) const
3894 {
3895  AssertLockHeld(cs_main);
3896  int nResult = GetDepthInMainChainINTERNAL(pindexRet);
3897  if (nResult == 0 && !mempool.exists(GetHash()))
3898  return -1; // Not in chain, not in mempool
3899 
3900  if (enableIX) {
3901  if (nResult < 6) {
3902  int signatures = GetTransactionLockSignatures();
3903  if (signatures >= SWIFTTX_SIGNATURES_REQUIRED) {
3904  return nSwiftTXDepth + nResult;
3905  }
3906  }
3907  }
3908 
3909  return nResult;
3910 }

3929 int CMerkleTx::GetTransactionLockSignatures() const
3930 {
3931  if (fLargeWorkForkFound || fLargeWorkInvalidChainFound) return -2;
3932  if (!IsSporkActive(SPORK_2_SWIFTTX)) return -3;
3933  if (!fEnableSwiftTX) return -1;

3936  std::map<uint256, CTransactionLock>::iterator i = mapTxLocks.find(GetHash());

3957 bool CWallet::CreateZerocoinMintTransaction(const CAmount nValue, CMutableTransaction& txNew, vector<CZerocoinMint>& vMints, CReserveKey* reservekey, int64_t& nFeeRet, std::string& strFailReason, const CCoinControl* coinControl, const bool isZCSpendChange)
3958 {
3959  if (IsLocked()) {
3960  strFailReason = _("Error: Wallet locked, unable to create transaction!");
3961  LogPrintf("SpendZerocoin() : %s", strFailReason.c_str());
3962  return false;
3963  }
3964 
3965  //add multiple mints that will fit the amount requested as closely as possible
3966  CAmount nMintingValue = 0;
3967  CAmount nValueRemaining = 0;
3968  while (true) {
3969  //mint a coin with the closest denomination to what is being requested
3970  nFeeRet = max(static_cast<int>(txNew.vout.size()), 1) * Params().Zerocoin_MintFee();
3971  nValueRemaining = nValue - nMintingValue - (isZCSpendChange ? nFeeRet : 0);
3972 
3973  // if this is change of a zerocoinspend, then we can't mint all change, at least something must be given as a fee
3974  if (isZCSpendChange && nValueRemaining <= 1 * COIN)
3975  break;
3976 
3977  libzerocoin::CoinDenomination denomination = libzerocoin::AmountToClosestDenomination(nValueRemaining, nValueRemaining);
3978  if (denomination == libzerocoin::ZQ_ERROR)
3979  break;
3980 
3981  CAmount nValueNewMint = libzerocoin::ZerocoinDenominationToAmount(denomination);
3982  nMintingValue += nValueNewMint;
3983 
3984  // mint a new coin (create Pedersen Commitment) and extract PublicCoin that is shareable from it
3985  libzerocoin::PrivateCoin newCoin(Params().Zerocoin_Params(), denomination);
3986  libzerocoin::PublicCoin pubCoin = newCoin.getPublicCoin();
3987 
3988  // Validate
3989  if(!pubCoin.validate()) {
3990  strFailReason = _("failed to validate zerocoin");
3991  return false;
3992  }
3993 
3994  CScript scriptSerializedCoin = CScript() << OP_ZEROCOINMINT << pubCoin.getValue().getvch().size() << pubCoin.getValue().getvch();
3995  CTxOut outMint(nValueNewMint, scriptSerializedCoin);
3996  txNew.vout.push_back(outMint);
3997 
3998  //store as CZerocoinMint for later use
3999  CZerocoinMint mint(denomination, pubCoin.getValue(), newCoin.getRandomness(), newCoin.getSerialNumber(), false);
4000  vMints.push_back(mint);
4001  }
4002 
4003  // calculate fee
4004  CAmount nFee = Params().Zerocoin_MintFee() * txNew.vout.size();
4005 
4006  // no ability to select more coins if this is a ZCSpend change mint
4007  CAmount nTotalValue = (isZCSpendChange ? nValue : (nValue + nFee));
4008 
4009  // check for a zerocoinspend that mints the change
4010  CAmount nValueIn = 0;
4011  set<pair<const CWalletTx*, unsigned int> > setCoins;
4012  if (isZCSpendChange) {
4013  nValueIn = nValue;
4014  } else {
4015  // select UTXO's to use
4016  if (!SelectCoins(nTotalValue, setCoins, nValueIn, coinControl)) {
4017  strFailReason = _("Insufficient or insufficient confirmed funds, you might need to wait a few minutes and try again.");
4018  return false;
4019  }
4020 
4021  // Fill vin
4022  for (const std::pair<const CWalletTx*, unsigned int>& coin : setCoins)
4023  txNew.vin.push_back(CTxIn(coin.first->GetHash(), coin.second));
4024  }
4025 
4026  //any change that is less than 0.0100000 will be ignored and given as an extra fee
4027  //also assume that a zerocoinspend that is minting the change will not have any change that goes to Div
4028  CAmount nChange = nValueIn - nTotalValue; // Fee already accounted for in nTotalValue
4029  if (nChange > 1 * CENT && !isZCSpendChange) {
4030  // Fill a vout to ourself
4031  CScript scriptChange;
4032 
4033  // if coin control: send change to custom address
4034  if (coinControl && !boost::get<CNoDestination>(&coinControl->destChange))
4035  scriptChange = GetScriptForDestination(coinControl->destChange);
4036  else {
4037  // Reserve a new key pair from key pool
4038  CPubKey vchPubKey;
4039  assert(reservekey->GetReservedKey(vchPubKey)); // should never fail, as we just unlocked
4040  scriptChange = GetScriptForDestination(vchPubKey.GetID());
4041  }
4042 
4043  //add to the transaction
4044  CTxOut outChange(nChange, scriptChange);
4045  txNew.vout.push_back(outChange);
4046  } else {
4047  if (reservekey)
4048  reservekey->ReturnKey();
4049  }
4050 
4051  // Sign if these are divi outputs - NOTE that zDiv outputs are signed later in SoK
4052  if (!isZCSpendChange) {
4053  int nIn = 0;
4054  for (const std::pair<const CWalletTx*, unsigned int>& coin : setCoins) {
4055  if (!SignSignature(*this, *coin.first, txNew, nIn++)) {
4056  strFailReason = _("Signing transaction failed");
4057  return false;
4058  }
4059  }
4060  }
4061 
4062  return true;
4063 }
4064 
4065 bool CWallet::MintToTxIn(CZerocoinMint zerocoinSelected, int nSecurityLevel, const uint256& hashTxOut, CTxIn& newTxIn, CZerocoinSpendReceipt& receipt)
4066 {
4067  // Default error status if not changed below
4068  receipt.SetStatus(_("Transaction Mint Started"), ZDIV_TXMINT_GENERAL);
4069 
4070  libzerocoin::CoinDenomination denomination = zerocoinSelected.GetDenomination();
4071  // 2. Get pubcoin from the private coin
4072  libzerocoin::PublicCoin pubCoinSelected(Params().Zerocoin_Params(), zerocoinSelected.GetValue(), denomination);
4073  LogPrintf("%s : pubCoinSelected:\n denom=%d\n value%s\n", __func__, denomination, pubCoinSelected.getValue().GetHex());
4074  if (!pubCoinSelected.validate()) {
4075  receipt.SetStatus(_("The selected mint coin is an invalid coin"), ZDIV_INVALID_COIN);
4076  return false;
4077  }
4078 
4079  // 3. Compute Accumulator and Witness
4080  libzerocoin::Accumulator accumulator(Params().Zerocoin_Params(), pubCoinSelected.getDenomination());
4081  libzerocoin::AccumulatorWitness witness(Params().Zerocoin_Params(), accumulator, pubCoinSelected);
4082  string strFailReason = "";
4083  int nMintsAdded = 0;
4084  if (!GenerateAccumulatorWitness(pubCoinSelected, accumulator, witness, nSecurityLevel, nMintsAdded, strFailReason)) {
4085  receipt.SetStatus(_("Try to spend with a higher security level to include more coins"), ZDIV_FAILED_ACCUMULATOR_INITIALIZATION);
4086  LogPrintf("%s : %s \n", __func__, receipt.GetStatusMessage());
4087  return false;
4088  }
4089 
4090  // Construct the CoinSpend object. This acts like a signature on the transaction.
4091  libzerocoin::PrivateCoin privateCoin(Params().Zerocoin_Params(), denomination);
4092  privateCoin.setPublicCoin(pubCoinSelected);
4093  privateCoin.setRandomness(zerocoinSelected.GetRandomness());
4094  privateCoin.setSerialNumber(zerocoinSelected.GetSerialNumber());
4095  uint32_t nChecksum = GetChecksum(accumulator.getValue());
4096 
4097  try {
4098  libzerocoin::CoinSpend spend(Params().Zerocoin_Params(), privateCoin, accumulator, nChecksum, witness, hashTxOut);
4099 
4100  if (!spend.Verify(accumulator)) {
4101  receipt.SetStatus(_("The new spend coin transaction did not verify"), ZDIV_INVALID_WITNESS);
4102  return false;
4103  }
4104 
4105  // Deserialize the CoinSpend intro a fresh object
4106  CDataStream serializedCoinSpend(SER_NETWORK, PROTOCOL_VERSION);
4107  serializedCoinSpend << spend;
4108  std::vector<unsigned char> data(serializedCoinSpend.begin(), serializedCoinSpend.end());
4109 
4110  //Add the coin spend into a DIVI transaction
4111  newTxIn.scriptSig = CScript() << OP_ZEROCOINSPEND << data.size();
4112  newTxIn.scriptSig.insert(newTxIn.scriptSig.end(), data.begin(), data.end());
4113  newTxIn.prevout.SetNull();
4114 
4115  //use nSequence as a shorthand lookup of denomination
4116  //NOTE that this should never be used in place of checking the value in the final blockchain acceptance/verification
4117  //of the transaction
4118  newTxIn.nSequence = denomination;
4119 
4120  CDataStream serializedCoinSpendChecking(SER_NETWORK, PROTOCOL_VERSION);
4121  try {
4122  serializedCoinSpendChecking << spend;
4123  }
4124  catch (...) {
4125  receipt.SetStatus(_("Failed to deserialize"), ZDIV_BAD_SERIALIZATION);
4126  return false;
4127  }
4128 
4129  libzerocoin::CoinSpend newSpendChecking(Params().Zerocoin_Params(), serializedCoinSpendChecking);
4130  if (!newSpendChecking.Verify(accumulator)) {
4131  receipt.SetStatus(_("The transaction did not verify"), ZDIV_BAD_SERIALIZATION);
4132  return false;
4133  }
4134 
4135  std::list<CBigNum> listCoinSpendSerial = CWalletDB(strWalletFile).ListSpentCoinsSerial();
4136  for (const CBigNum& item : listCoinSpendSerial) {
4137  if (spend.getCoinSerialNumber() == item) {
4138  //Tried to spend an already spent zDiv
4139  zerocoinSelected.SetUsed(true);
4140  if (!CWalletDB(strWalletFile).WriteZerocoinMint(zerocoinSelected))
4141  LogPrintf("%s failed to write zerocoinmint\n", __func__);
4142 
4143  pwalletMain->NotifyZerocoinChanged(pwalletMain, zerocoinSelected.GetValue().GetHex(), "Used", CT_UPDATED);
4144  receipt.SetStatus(_("The coin spend has been used"), ZDIV_SPENT_USED_ZDIV);
4145  return false;
4146  }
4147  }
4148 
4149  uint32_t nAccumulatorChecksum = GetChecksum(accumulator.getValue());
4150  CZerocoinSpend zcSpend(spend.getCoinSerialNumber(), 0, zerocoinSelected.GetValue(), zerocoinSelected.GetDenomination(), nAccumulatorChecksum);
4151  zcSpend.SetMintCount(nMintsAdded);
4152  receipt.AddSpend(zcSpend);
4153  }
4154  catch (const std::exception&) {
4155  receipt.SetStatus(_("CoinSpend: Accumulator witness does not verify"), ZDIV_INVALID_WITNESS);
4156  return false;
4157  }
4158 
4159  receipt.SetStatus(_("Spend Valid"), ZDIV_SPEND_OKAY); // Everything okay
4160 
4161  return true;
4162 }

4164 bool CWallet::CreateZerocoinSpendTransaction(CAmount nValue, int nSecurityLevel, CWalletTx& wtxNew, CReserveKey& reserveKey, CZerocoinSpendReceipt& receipt, vector<CZerocoinMint>& vSelectedMints, vector<CZerocoinMint>& vNewMints, bool fMintChange, bool fMinimizeChange, CBitcoinAddress* address)
4165 {
4166  // Check available funds
4167  int nStatus = ZDIV_TRX_FUNDS_PROBLEMS;
4168  if (nValue > GetZerocoinBalance(true)) {
4169  receipt.SetStatus(_("You don't have enough Zerocoins in your wallet"), nStatus);
4170  return false;
4171  }
4172 
4173  if (nValue < 1) {
4174  receipt.SetStatus(_("Value is below the the smallest available denomination (= 1) of zDiv"), nStatus);
4175  return false;
4176  }
4177 
4178  // Create transaction
4179  nStatus = ZDIV_TRX_CREATE;
4180 
4181  // If not already given pre-selected mints, then select mints from the wallet
4182  CWalletDB walletdb(pwalletMain->strWalletFile);
4183  list<CZerocoinMint> listMints;
4184  CAmount nValueSelected = 0;
4185  int nCoinsReturned = 0; // Number of coins returned in change from function below (for debug)
4186  int nNeededSpends = 0; // Number of spends which would be needed if selection failed
4187  const int nMaxSpends = Params().Zerocoin_MaxSpendsPerTransaction(); // Maximum possible spends for one zDIV transaction
4188  if (vSelectedMints.empty()) {
4189  listMints = walletdb.ListMintedCoins(true, true, true); // need to find mints to spend
4190  if(listMints.empty()) {
4191  receipt.SetStatus(_("Failed to find Zerocoins in in wallet.dat"), nStatus);
4192  return false;
4193  }
4194 
4195  // If the input value is not an int, then we want the selection algorithm to round up to the next highest int
4196  double dValue = static_cast<double>(nValue) / static_cast<double>(COIN);
4197  bool fWholeNumber = floor(dValue) == dValue;
4198  CAmount nValueToSelect = nValue;
4199  if(!fWholeNumber)
4200  nValueToSelect = static_cast<CAmount>(ceil(dValue) * COIN);
4201 
4202  // Select the zDiv mints to use in this spend
4203  std::map<libzerocoin::CoinDenomination, CAmount> DenomMap = GetMyZerocoinDistribution();
4204  vSelectedMints = SelectMintsFromList(nValueToSelect, nValueSelected, nMaxSpends, fMinimizeChange,
4205  nCoinsReturned, listMints, DenomMap, nNeededSpends);
4206  } else {
4207  for (const CZerocoinMint mint : vSelectedMints)
4208  nValueSelected += ZerocoinDenominationToAmount(mint.GetDenomination());
4209  }
4210 
4211  listSpends(vSelectedMints);
4212 
4213  int nArchived = 0;
4214  for (CZerocoinMint mint : vSelectedMints) {
4215  // see if this serial has already been spent
4216  if (IsSerialKnown(mint.GetSerialNumber())) {
4217  receipt.SetStatus(_("Trying to spend an already spent serial #, try again."), nStatus);
4218 
4219  mint.SetUsed(true);
4220  walletdb.WriteZerocoinMint(mint);
4221 
4222  return false;
4223  }
4224 
4225  //check that this mint made it into the blockchain
4226  CTransaction txMint;
4227  uint256 hashBlock;
4228  bool fArchive = false;
4229  if (!GetTransaction(mint.GetTxHash(), txMint, hashBlock)) {
4230  receipt.SetStatus(_("Unable to find transaction containing mint"), nStatus);
4231  fArchive = true;
4232  } else if (mapBlockIndex.count(hashBlock) < 1) {
4233  receipt.SetStatus(_("Mint did not make it into blockchain"), nStatus);
4234  fArchive = true;
4235  }
4236 
4237  // archive this mint as an orphan
4238  if (fArchive) {
4239  walletdb.ArchiveMintOrphan(mint);
4240  nArchived++;
4241  }
4242  }
4243  if (nArchived)
4244  return false;
4245 
4246  if (vSelectedMints.empty()) {
4247  if(nNeededSpends > 0){
4248  // Too much spends needed, so abuse nStatus to report back the number of needed spends
4249  receipt.SetStatus(_("Too many spends needed"), nStatus, nNeededSpends);
4250  }
4251  else {
4252  receipt.SetStatus(_("Failed to select a zerocoin"), nStatus);
4253  }
4254  return false;
4255  }
4256 
4257  if ((static_cast<int>(vSelectedMints.size()) > Params().Zerocoin_MaxSpendsPerTransaction())) {
4258  receipt.SetStatus(_("Failed to find coin set amongst held coins with less than maxNumber of Spends"), nStatus);
4259  return false;
4260  }
4261 
4262  // Create change if needed
4263  nStatus = ZDIV_TRX_CHANGE;
4264 
4265  CMutableTransaction txNew;
4266  wtxNew.BindWallet(this);
4267  {
4268  LOCK2(cs_main, cs_wallet);
4269  {
4270  txNew.vin.clear();
4271  txNew.vout.clear();
4272 
4273  //if there is an address to send to then use it, if not generate a new address to send to
4274  CScript scriptZerocoinSpend;
4275  CScript scriptChange;
4276  CAmount nChange = nValueSelected - nValue;
4277  if (nChange && !address) {
4278  receipt.SetStatus(_("Need address because change is not exact"), nStatus);
4279  return false;
4280  }
4281 
4282  if (address) {
4283  scriptZerocoinSpend = GetScriptForDestination(address->Get());
4284  if (nChange) {
4285  // Reserve a new key pair from key pool
4286  CPubKey vchPubKey;
4287  assert(reserveKey.GetReservedKey(vchPubKey)); // should never fail
4288  scriptChange = GetScriptForDestination(vchPubKey.GetID());
4289  }
4290  } else {
4291  // Reserve a new key pair from key pool
4292  CPubKey vchPubKey;
4293  assert(reserveKey.GetReservedKey(vchPubKey)); // should never fail
4294  scriptZerocoinSpend = GetScriptForDestination(vchPubKey.GetID());
4295  }
4296 
4297  //add change output if we are spending too much (only applies to spending multiple at once)
4298  if (nChange) {
4299  //mint change as zerocoins
4300  if (fMintChange) {
4301  CAmount nFeeRet = 0;
4302  string strFailReason = "";
4303  if (!CreateZerocoinMintTransaction(nChange, txNew, vNewMints, &reserveKey, nFeeRet, strFailReason, NULL, true)) {
4304  receipt.SetStatus(_("Failed to create mint"), nStatus);
4305  return false;
4306  }
4307  } else {
4308  CTxOut txOutChange(nValueSelected - nValue, scriptChange);
4309  txNew.vout.push_back(txOutChange);
4310  }
4311  }
4312 
4313  //add output to divi address to the transaction (the actual primary spend taking place)
4314  CTxOut txOutZerocoinSpend(nValue, scriptZerocoinSpend);
4315  txNew.vout.push_back(txOutZerocoinSpend);
4316 
4317  //hash with only the output info in it to be used in Signature of Knowledge
4318  uint256 hashTxOut = txNew.GetHash();
4319 
4320  //add all of the mints to the transaction as inputs
4321  for (CZerocoinMint mint : vSelectedMints) {
4322  CTxIn newTxIn;
4323  if (!MintToTxIn(mint, nSecurityLevel, hashTxOut, newTxIn, receipt)) {
4324  return false;
4325  }
4326  txNew.vin.push_back(newTxIn);
4327  }
4328 
4329  // Limit size
4330  unsigned int nBytes = ::GetSerializeSize(txNew, SER_NETWORK, PROTOCOL_VERSION);
4331  if (nBytes >= MAX_ZEROCOIN_TX_SIZE) {
4332  receipt.SetStatus(_("In rare cases, a spend with 7 coins exceeds our maximum allowable transaction size, please retry spend using 6 or less coins"), ZDIV_TX_TOO_LARGE);
4333  return false;
4334  }
4335 
4336  //now that all inputs have been added, add full tx hash to zerocoinspend records and write to db
4337  uint256 txHash = txNew.GetHash();
4338  for (CZerocoinSpend spend : receipt.GetSpends()) {
4339  spend.SetTxHash(txHash);
4340 
4341  if (!CWalletDB(strWalletFile).WriteZerocoinSpendSerialEntry(spend)) {
4342  receipt.SetStatus(_("Failed to write coin serial number into wallet"), nStatus);
4343  }
4344  }
4345 
4346  //turn the finalized transaction into a wallet transaction
4347  wtxNew = CWalletTx(this, txNew);
4348  wtxNew.fFromMe = true;
4349  wtxNew.fTimeReceivedIsTxTime = true;
4350  wtxNew.nTimeReceived = GetAdjustedTime();
4351  }
4352  }
4353 
4354  receipt.SetStatus(_("Transaction Created"), ZDIV_SPEND_OKAY); // Everything okay
4355 
4356  return true;
4357 }

4359 string CWallet::ResetMintZerocoin(bool fExtendedSearch)
4360 {
4361  long updates = 0;
4362  long deletions = 0;
4363  CWalletDB walletdb(pwalletMain->strWalletFile);
4364 
4365  list<CZerocoinMint> listMints = walletdb.ListMintedCoins(false, false, true);
4366  vector<CZerocoinMint> vMintsToFind{ std::make_move_iterator(std::begin(listMints)), std::make_move_iterator(std::end(listMints)) };
4367  vector<CZerocoinMint> vMintsMissing;
4368  vector<CZerocoinMint> vMintsToUpdate;
4369 
4370  // search all of our available data for these mints
4371  FindMints(vMintsToFind, vMintsToUpdate, vMintsMissing, fExtendedSearch);
4372 
4373  // Update the meta data of mints that were marked for updating
4374  for (CZerocoinMint mint : vMintsToUpdate) {
4375  updates++;
4376  walletdb.WriteZerocoinMint(mint);
4377  }
4378 
4379  // Delete any mints that were unable to be located on the blockchain
4380  for (CZerocoinMint mint : vMintsMissing) {
4381  deletions++;
4382  walletdb.ArchiveMintOrphan(mint);
4383  }
4384 
4385  string strResult = _("ResetMintZerocoin finished: ") + to_string(updates) + _(" mints updated, ") + to_string(deletions) + _(" mints deleted\n");
4386  return strResult;
4387 }

4389 string CWallet::ResetSpentZerocoin()
4390 {
4391  long removed = 0;
4392  CWalletDB walletdb(pwalletMain->strWalletFile);
4393 
4394  list<CZerocoinMint> listMints = walletdb.ListMintedCoins(false, false, false);
4395  list<CZerocoinSpend> listSpends = walletdb.ListSpentCoins();
4396  list<CZerocoinSpend> listUnconfirmedSpends;
4397 
4398  for (CZerocoinSpend spend : listSpends) {
4399  CTransaction tx;
4400  uint256 hashBlock = 0;
4401  if (!GetTransaction(spend.GetTxHash(), tx, hashBlock)) {
4402  listUnconfirmedSpends.push_back(spend);
4403  continue;
4404  }
4405 
4406  //no confirmations
4407  if (hashBlock == 0)
4408  listUnconfirmedSpends.push_back(spend);
4409  }
4410 
4411  for (CZerocoinSpend spend : listUnconfirmedSpends) {
4412  for (CZerocoinMint mint : listMints) {
4413  if (mint.GetSerialNumber() == spend.GetSerial()) {
4414  removed++;
4415  mint.SetUsed(false);
4416  RemoveSerialFromDB(spend.GetSerial());
4417  walletdb.WriteZerocoinMint(mint);
4418  walletdb.EraseZerocoinSpendSerialEntry(spend.GetSerial());
4419  continue;
4420  }
4421  }
4422  }
4423 
4424  string strResult = _("ResetSpentZerocoin finished: ") + to_string(removed) + _(" unconfirmed transactions removed\n");
4425  return strResult;
4426 }

4428 void CWallet::ReconsiderZerocoins(std::list<CZerocoinMint>& listMintsRestored)
4429 {
4430  CWalletDB walletdb(pwalletMain->strWalletFile);
4431  list<CZerocoinMint> listMints = walletdb.ListArchivedZerocoins();
4432 
4433  if (listMints.empty())
4434  return;
4435 
4436  for (CZerocoinMint mint : listMints) {
4437  if (IsSerialKnown(mint.GetSerialNumber()))
4438  continue;
4439 
4440  uint256 txHash;
4441  if (!GetZerocoinMint(mint.GetValue(), txHash))
4442  continue;
4443 
4444  uint256 hashBlock = 0;
4445  CTransaction tx;
4446  if (!GetTransaction(txHash, tx, hashBlock))
4447  continue;
4448 
4449  mint.SetTxHash(txHash);
4450  mint.SetHeight(mapBlockIndex.at(hashBlock)->nHeight);
4451  if (!walletdb.UnarchiveZerocoin(mint)) {
4452  LogPrintf("%s : failed to unarchive mint %s\n", __func__, mint.GetValue().GetHex());
4453  }
4454  listMintsRestored.emplace_back(mint);
4455  }
4456 }

4459 void CWallet::ZDivBackupWallet()
4460 {
4461  filesystem::path backupDir = GetDataDir() / "backups";
4462  filesystem::path backupPath;
4463  string strNewBackupName;
4464 
4465  for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
4466  strNewBackupName = strprintf("wallet-autozdivbackup-%d.dat", i);
4467  backupPath = backupDir / strNewBackupName;
4468 
4469  if (filesystem::exists(backupPath)) {
4470  //Keep up to 10 backups
4471  if (i <= 8) {
4472  //If the next file backup exists and is newer, then iterate
4473  filesystem::path nextBackupPath = backupDir / strprintf("wallet-autozdivbackup-%d.dat", i + 1);
4474  if (filesystem::exists(nextBackupPath)) {
4475  time_t timeThis = filesystem::last_write_time(backupPath);
4476  time_t timeNext = filesystem::last_write_time(nextBackupPath);
4477  if (timeThis > timeNext) {
4478  //The next backup is created before this backup was
4479  //The next backup is the correct path to use
4480  backupPath = nextBackupPath;
4481  break;
4482  }
4483  }
4484  //Iterate to the next filename/number
4485  continue;
4486  }
4487  //reset to 0 because name with 9 already used
4488  strNewBackupName = strprintf("wallet-autozdivbackup-%d.dat", 0);
4489  backupPath = backupDir / strNewBackupName;
4490  break;
4491  }
4492  //This filename is fresh, break here and backup
4493  break;
4494  }
4495 
4496  BackupWallet(*this, backupPath.string());
4497 }

4499 string CWallet::MintZerocoin(CAmount nValue, CWalletTx& wtxNew, vector<CZerocoinMint>& vMints, const CCoinControl* coinControl)
4500 {
4501  // Check amount
4502  if (nValue <= 0)
4503  return _("Invalid amount");
4504 
4505  if (nValue + Params().Zerocoin_MintFee() > GetBalance())
4506  return _("Insufficient funds");
4507 
4508  CReserveKey reservekey(this);
4509  int64_t nFeeRequired;
4510 
4511  if (IsLocked()) {
4512  string strError = _("Error: Wallet locked, unable to create transaction!");
4513  LogPrintf("MintZerocoin() : %s", strError.c_str());
4514  return strError;
4515  }
4516 
4517  string strError;
4518  CMutableTransaction txNew;
4519  if (!CreateZerocoinMintTransaction(nValue, txNew, vMints, &reservekey, nFeeRequired, strError, coinControl)) {
4520  if (nValue + nFeeRequired > GetBalance())
4521  return strprintf(_("Error: This transaction requires a transaction fee of at least %s because of its amount, complexity, or use of recently received funds!"), FormatMoney(nFeeRequired).c_str());
4522  return strError;
4523  }
4524 
4525  wtxNew = CWalletTx(this, txNew);
4526  wtxNew.fFromMe = true;
4527  wtxNew.fTimeReceivedIsTxTime = true;
4528 
4529  // Limit size
4530  unsigned int nBytes = ::GetSerializeSize(txNew, SER_NETWORK, PROTOCOL_VERSION);
4531  if (nBytes >= MAX_ZEROCOIN_TX_SIZE) {
4532  return _("Error: The transaction is larger than the maximum allowed transaction size!");
4533  }
4534 
4535  //commit the transaction to the network
4536  if (!CommitTransaction(wtxNew, reservekey)) {
4537  return _("Error: The transaction was rejected! This might happen if some of the coins in your wallet were already spent, such as if you used a copy of wallet.dat and coins were spent in the copy but not marked as spent here.");
4538  } else {
4539  //update mints with full transaction hash and then database them
4540  CWalletDB walletdb(pwalletMain->strWalletFile);
4541  for (CZerocoinMint mint : vMints) {
4542  mint.SetTxHash(wtxNew.GetHash());
4543  walletdb.WriteZerocoinMint(mint);
4544  pwalletMain->NotifyZerocoinChanged(pwalletMain, mint.GetValue().GetHex(), "Used", CT_UPDATED);
4545  }
4546  }
4547 
4548  //Create a backup of the wallet
4549  if (fBackupMints)
4550  ZDivBackupWallet();
4551 
4552  return "";
4553 }

4555 bool CWallet::SpendZerocoin(CAmount nAmount, int nSecurityLevel, CWalletTx& wtxNew, CZerocoinSpendReceipt& receipt, vector<CZerocoinMint>& vMintsSelected, bool fMintChange, bool fMinimizeChange, CBitcoinAddress* addressTo)
4556 {
4557  // Default: assume something goes wrong. Depending on the problem this gets more specific below
4558  int nStatus = ZDIV_SPEND_ERROR;
4559 
4560  if (IsLocked()) {
4561  receipt.SetStatus("Error: Wallet locked, unable to create transaction!", ZDIV_WALLET_LOCKED);
4562  return false;
4563  }
4564 
4565  CReserveKey reserveKey(this);
4566  vector<CZerocoinMint> vNewMints;
4567  if (!CreateZerocoinSpendTransaction(nAmount, nSecurityLevel, wtxNew, reserveKey, receipt, vMintsSelected, vNewMints, fMintChange, fMinimizeChange, addressTo)) {
4568  return false;
4569  }
4570 
4571  if (fMintChange && fBackupMints)
4572  ZDivBackupWallet();
4573 
4574  CWalletDB walletdb(pwalletMain->strWalletFile);
4575  if (!CommitTransaction(wtxNew, reserveKey)) {
4576  LogPrintf("%s: failed to commit\n", __func__);
4577  nStatus = ZDIV_COMMIT_FAILED;
4578 
4579  //reset all mints
4580  for (CZerocoinMint mint : vMintsSelected) {
4581  mint.SetUsed(false); // having error, so set to false, to be able to use again
4582  walletdb.WriteZerocoinMint(mint);
4583  pwalletMain->NotifyZerocoinChanged(pwalletMain, mint.GetValue().GetHex(), "New", CT_UPDATED);
4584  }
4585 
4586  //erase spends
4587  for (CZerocoinSpend spend : receipt.GetSpends()) {
4588  if (!walletdb.EraseZerocoinSpendSerialEntry(spend.GetSerial())) {
4589  receipt.SetStatus("Error: It cannot delete coin serial number in wallet", ZDIV_ERASE_SPENDS_FAILED);
4590  }
4591 
4592  //Remove from public zerocoinDB
4593  RemoveSerialFromDB(spend.GetSerial());
4594  }
4595 
4596  // erase new mints
4597  for (auto& mint : vNewMints) {
4598  if (!walletdb.EraseZerocoinMint(mint)) {
4599  receipt.SetStatus("Error: Unable to cannot delete zerocoin mint in wallet", ZDIV_ERASE_NEW_MINTS_FAILED);
4600  }
4601  }
4602 
4603  receipt.SetStatus("Error: The transaction was rejected! This might happen if some of the coins in your wallet were already spent, such as if you used a copy of wallet.dat and coins were spent in the copy but not marked as spent here.", nStatus);
4604  return false;
4605  }
4606 
4607  for (CZerocoinMint mint : vMintsSelected) {
4608  mint.SetUsed(true);
4609  if (!walletdb.WriteZerocoinMint(mint)) {
4610  receipt.SetStatus("Failed to write mint to db", nStatus);
4611  return false;
4612  }
4613 
4614  CZerocoinMint mintCheck;
4615  if (!walletdb.ReadZerocoinMint(mint.GetValue(), mintCheck)) {
4616  receipt.SetStatus("failed to read mintcheck", nStatus);
4617  return false;
4618  }
4619 
4620  if (!mintCheck.IsUsed()) {
4621  receipt.SetStatus("Error, the mint did not get marked as used", nStatus);
4622  return false;
4623  }
4624  }
4625 
4626  // write new Mints to db
4627  for (CZerocoinMint mint : vNewMints) {
4628  mint.SetTxHash(wtxNew.GetHash());
4629  walletdb.WriteZerocoinMint(mint);
4630  }
4631 
4632  receipt.SetStatus("Spend Successful", ZDIV_SPEND_OKAY); // When we reach this point spending zDIV was successful
4633 
4634  return true;
4635 }
